        <td id="LC115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and every time I hit him my old heart most breaks. Well-a-well, man</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="116"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="161"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="162"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="171"></td>
        <td id="LC171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The trouble vanished out of Tom&#39;s face. He opened his jacket. His</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="172"></td>

        <td id="L173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="173"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="174"></td>
        <td id="LC174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Bother! Well, go &#39;long with you. I&#39;d made sure you&#39;d played hookey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="175"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well why don&#39;t you DO it? You SAY you can do it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="354"></td>
        <td id="LC354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with derision. Tom struck them to the ground. In an instant both boys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="355"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="359"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At last the stranger got out a smothered &quot;&#39;Nuff!&quot; and Tom let him up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="367"></td>
        <td id="LC367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and said:</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="369"></td>
        <td id="LC369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now that&#39;ll learn you. Better look out who you&#39;re fooling with next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="370"></td>
        <td id="LC370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="371"></td>
        <td id="LC371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="372"></td>
        <td id="LC372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The new boy went off brushing the dust from his clothes, sobbing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="373"></td>
        <td id="LC373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snuffling, and occasionally looking back and shaking his head and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="374"></td>
        <td id="LC374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">threatening what he would do to Tom the &quot;next time he caught him out.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="375"></td>
        <td id="LC375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To which Tom responded with jeers, and started off in high feather, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="376"></td>
        <td id="LC376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as soon as his back was turned the new boy snatched up a stone, threw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="377"></td>
        <td id="LC377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it and hit him between the shoulders and then turned tail and ran like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="378"></td>
        <td id="LC378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an antelope. Tom chased the traitor home, and thus found out where he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="379"></td>
        <td id="LC379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lived. He then held a position at the gate for some time, daring the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="380"></td>
        <td id="LC380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemy to come outside, but the enemy only made faces at him through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="381"></td>
        <td id="LC381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window and declined. At last the enemy&#39;s mother appeared, and called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="382"></td>
        <td id="LC382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom a bad, vicious, vulgar child, and ordered him away. So he went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="383"></td>
        <td id="LC383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away; but he said he &quot;&#39;lowed&quot; to &quot;lay&quot; for that boy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="384"></td>
        <td id="LC384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="385"></td>
        <td id="LC385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He got home pretty late that night, and when he climbed cautiously in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="386"></td>
        <td id="LC386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the window, he uncovered an ambuscade, in the person of his aunt;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="387"></td>
        <td id="LC387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and when she saw the state his clothes were in her resolution to turn</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="388"></td>

        <td id="L389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="389"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="392"></td>
        <td id="LC392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER II</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="393"></td>
        <td id="LC393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="394"></td>
        <td id="LC394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SATURDAY morning was come, and all the summer world was bright and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="395"></td>
        <td id="LC395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fresh, and brimming with life. There was a song in every heart; and if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="396"></td>
        <td id="LC396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the heart was young the music issued at the lips. There was cheer in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="397"></td>
        <td id="LC397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every face and a spring in every step. The locust-trees were in bloom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="398"></td>
        <td id="LC398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the fragrance of the blossoms filled the air. Cardiff Hill, beyond</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="399"></td>
        <td id="LC399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the village and above it, was green with vegetation and it lay just far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="400"></td>
        <td id="LC400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough away to seem a Delectable Land, dreamy, reposeful, and inviting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="401"></td>
        <td id="LC401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="402"></td>
        <td id="LC402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom appeared on the sidewalk with a bucket of whitewash and a long-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="403"></td>
        <td id="LC403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handled brush. He surveyed the fence, and all gladness left him and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="404"></td>
        <td id="LC404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deep melancholy settled down upon his spirit. Thirty yards of board</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="405"></td>
        <td id="LC405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fence nine feet high. Life to him seemed hollow, and existence but a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="406"></td>
        <td id="LC406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burden. Sighing, he dipped his brush and passed it along the topmost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="407"></td>
        <td id="LC407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plank; repeated the operation; did it again; compared the insignificant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="408"></td>
        <td id="LC408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whitewashed streak with the far-reaching continent of unwhitewashed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="409"></td>
        <td id="LC409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fence, and sat down on a tree-box discouraged. Jim came skipping out at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="410"></td>
        <td id="LC410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gate with a tin pail, and singing Buffalo Gals. Bringing water from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="411"></td>
        <td id="LC411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the town pump had always been hateful work in Tom&#39;s eyes, before, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="412"></td>
        <td id="LC412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now it did not strike him so. He remembered that there was company at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="413"></td>
        <td id="LC413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pump. White, mulatto, and negro boys and girls were always there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="414"></td>
        <td id="LC414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waiting their turns, resting, trading playthings, quarrelling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="415"></td>
        <td id="LC415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fighting, skylarking. And he remembered that although the pump was only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="416"></td>
        <td id="LC416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a hundred and fifty yards off, Jim never got back with a bucket of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="417"></td>
        <td id="LC417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water under an hour--and even then somebody generally had to go after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="418"></td>
        <td id="LC418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="419"></td>
        <td id="LC419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="420"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="421"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="422"></td>
        <td id="LC422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim shook his head and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="423"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="424"></td>
        <td id="LC424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Can&#39;t, Mars Tom. Ole missis, she tole me I got to go an&#39; git dis</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="425"></td>
        <td id="LC425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water an&#39; not stop foolin&#39; roun&#39; wid anybody. She say she spec&#39; Mars</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="426"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="428"></td>
        <td id="LC428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="429"></td>
        <td id="LC429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, never you mind what she said, Jim. That&#39;s the way she always</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="432"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="433"></td>
        <td id="LC433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, I dasn&#39;t, Mars Tom. Ole missis she&#39;d take an&#39; tar de head off&#39;n</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="434"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="435"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="436"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="437"></td>
        <td id="LC437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thimble--and who cares for that, I&#39;d like to know. She talks awful, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk don&#39;t hurt--anyways it don&#39;t if she don&#39;t cry. Jim, I&#39;ll give you</td>

        <td id="L439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="439"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="440"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="441"></td>
        <td id="LC441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim began to waver.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="442"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="444"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My! Dat&#39;s a mighty gay marvel, I tell you! But Mars Tom I&#39;s powerful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="446"></td>
        <td id="LC446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;fraid ole missis--&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="447"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="448"></td>
        <td id="LC448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And besides, if you will I&#39;ll show you my sore toe.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="449"></td>
        <td id="LC449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="450"></td>
        <td id="LC450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim was only human--this attraction was too much for him. He put down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="451"></td>
        <td id="LC451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his pail, took the white alley, and bent over the toe with absorbing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="452"></td>
        <td id="LC452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest while the bandage was being unwound. In another moment he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="453"></td>
        <td id="LC453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flying down the street with his pail and a tingling rear, Tom was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="454"></td>
        <td id="LC454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whitewashing with vigor, and Aunt Polly was retiring from the field</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="455"></td>
        <td id="LC455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a slipper in her hand and triumph in her eye.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="456"></td>
        <td id="LC456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="457"></td>
        <td id="LC457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Tom&#39;s energy did not last. He began to think of the fun he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="458"></td>
        <td id="LC458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">planned for this day, and his sorrows multiplied. Soon the free boys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="459"></td>
        <td id="LC459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would come tripping along on all sorts of delicious expeditions, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="460"></td>
        <td id="LC460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would make a world of fun of him for having to work--the very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="461"></td>
        <td id="LC461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought of it burnt him like fire. He got out his worldly wealth and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="462"></td>
        <td id="LC462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">examined it--bits of toys, marbles, and trash; enough to buy an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="463"></td>
        <td id="LC463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exchange of WORK, maybe, but not half enough to buy so much as half an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="464"></td>
        <td id="LC464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour of pure freedom. So he returned his straitened means to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="465"></td>
        <td id="LC465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pocket, and gave up the idea of trying to buy the boys. At this dark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="466"></td>
        <td id="LC466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and hopeless moment an inspiration burst upon him! Nothing less than a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="467"></td>
        <td id="LC467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great, magnificent inspiration.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="468"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="469"></td>
        <td id="LC469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He took up his brush and went tranquilly to work. Ben Rogers hove in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="470"></td>
        <td id="LC470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight presently--the very boy, of all boys, whose ridicule he had been</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="471"></td>
        <td id="LC471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreading. Ben&#39;s gait was the hop-skip-and-jump--proof enough that his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="472"></td>
        <td id="LC472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart was light and his anticipations high. He was eating an apple, and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="563"></td>

        <td id="L570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="570"></td>

        <td id="L571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="571"></td>

        <td id="L580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="580"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="581"></td>

        <td id="L593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="593"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="598"></td>

        <td id="L601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="601"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="602"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="613"></td>
        <td id="LC613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER III</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="614"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="615"></td>
        <td id="LC615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM presented himself before Aunt Polly, who was sitting by an open</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="616"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="619"></td>
        <td id="LC619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bees had had their effect, and she was nodding over her knitting--for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="620"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="621"></td>
        <td id="LC621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spectacles were propped up on her gray head for safety. She had thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="622"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="623"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="624"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="625"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="626"></td>
        <td id="LC626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What, a&#39;ready? How much have you done?&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="627"></td>
        <td id="LC627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="628"></td>
        <td id="LC628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s all done, aunt.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="629"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="630"></td>
        <td id="LC630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom, don&#39;t lie to me--I can&#39;t bear it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="631"></td>
        <td id="LC631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="632"></td>

        <td id="L633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="633"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="634"></td>
        <td id="LC634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Polly placed small trust in such evidence. She went out to see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="635"></td>
        <td id="LC635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for herself; and she would have been content to find twenty per cent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="636"></td>
        <td id="LC636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Tom&#39;s statement true. When she found the entire fence whitewashed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="637"></td>
        <td id="LC637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and not only whitewashed but elaborately coated and recoated, and even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a streak added to the ground, her astonishment was almost unspeakable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="639"></td>
        <td id="LC639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="640"></td>
        <td id="LC640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="641"></td>
        <td id="LC641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, I never! There&#39;s no getting round it, you can work when you&#39;re</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="642"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="643"></td>
        <td id="LC643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it&#39;s powerful seldom you&#39;re a mind to, I&#39;m bound to say. Well, go &#39;long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="644"></td>
        <td id="LC644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and play; but mind you get back some time in a week, or I&#39;ll tan you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="645"></td>
        <td id="LC645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="646"></td>
        <td id="LC646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She was so overcome by the splendor of his achievement that she took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="647"></td>
        <td id="LC647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him into the closet and selected a choice apple and delivered it to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="648"></td>
        <td id="LC648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, along with an improving lecture upon the added value and flavor a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="649"></td>
        <td id="LC649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treat took to itself when it came without sin through virtuous effort.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="650"></td>
        <td id="LC650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And while she closed with a happy Scriptural flourish, he &quot;hooked&quot; a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="651"></td>
        <td id="LC651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doughnut.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="652"></td>
        <td id="LC652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="653"></td>
        <td id="LC653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then he skipped out, and saw Sid just starting up the outside stairway</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="654"></td>
        <td id="LC654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that led to the back rooms on the second floor. Clods were handy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="655"></td>
        <td id="LC655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the air was full of them in a twinkling. They raged around Sid like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="656"></td>
        <td id="LC656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hail-storm; and before Aunt Polly could collect her surprised faculties</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="657"></td>
        <td id="LC657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and sally to the rescue, six or seven clods had taken personal effect,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="752"></td>
        <td id="LC752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Umf! Well, you didn&#39;t get a lick amiss, I reckon. You been into some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="753"></td>
        <td id="LC753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other audacious mischief when I wasn&#39;t around, like enough.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="754"></td>
        <td id="LC754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="755"></td>
        <td id="LC755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then her conscience reproached her, and she yearned to say something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="756"></td>
        <td id="LC756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind and loving; but she judged that this would be construed into a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="757"></td>
        <td id="LC757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confession that she had been in the wrong, and discipline forbade that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="758"></td>
        <td id="LC758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So she kept silence, and went about her affairs with a troubled heart.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="759"></td>
        <td id="LC759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom sulked in a corner and exalted his woes. He knew that in her heart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="760"></td>
        <td id="LC760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his aunt was on her knees to him, and he was morosely gratified by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="761"></td>
        <td id="LC761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consciousness of it. He would hang out no signals, he would take notice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="762"></td>
        <td id="LC762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of none. He knew that a yearning glance fell upon him, now and then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="763"></td>
        <td id="LC763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through a film of tears, but he refused recognition of it. He pictured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="764"></td>
        <td id="LC764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself lying sick unto death and his aunt bending over him beseeching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="765"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="766"></td>
        <td id="LC766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">die with that word unsaid. Ah, how would she feel then? And he pictured</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="767"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="832"></td>
        <td id="LC832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="833"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="834"></td>
        <td id="LC834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE sun rose upon a tranquil world, and beamed down upon the peaceful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="835"></td>
        <td id="LC835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">village like a benediction. Breakfast over, Aunt Polly had family</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="836"></td>
        <td id="LC836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worship: it began with a prayer built from the ground up of solid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="837"></td>
        <td id="LC837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courses of Scriptural quotations, welded together with a thin mortar of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="838"></td>
        <td id="LC838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">originality; and from the summit of this she delivered a grim chapter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="839"></td>
        <td id="LC839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Mosaic Law, as from Sinai.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="840"></td>
        <td id="LC840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="841"></td>
        <td id="LC841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Tom girded up his loins, so to speak, and went to work to &quot;get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="842"></td>
        <td id="LC842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his verses.&quot; Sid had learned his lesson days before. Tom bent all his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="843"></td>
        <td id="LC843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">energies to the memorizing of five verses, and he chose part of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="844"></td>
        <td id="LC844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sermon on the Mount, because he could find no verses that were shorter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="845"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1308"></td>

        <td id="L1375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1375"></td>
        <td id="LC1375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">MONDAY morning found Tom Sawyer miserable. Monday morning always found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1376"></td>

        <td id="L1379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1379"></td>
        <td id="LC1379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more odious.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1380"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1381"></td>
        <td id="LC1381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom lay thinking. Presently it occurred to him that he wished he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1382"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1388"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1389"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1390"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1393"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1394"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1395"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1397"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1398"></td>
        <td id="LC1398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so he fell to groaning with considerable spirit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1399"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1774"></td>
        <td id="LC1774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The titter that rippled around the room appeared to abash the boy, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1775"></td>
        <td id="LC1775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in reality that result was caused rather more by his worshipful awe of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1776"></td>
        <td id="LC1776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his unknown idol and the dread pleasure that lay in his high good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1777"></td>
        <td id="LC1777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortune. He sat down upon the end of the pine bench and the girl</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1778"></td>
        <td id="LC1778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hitched herself away from him with a toss of her head. Nudges and winks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1779"></td>
        <td id="LC1779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and whispers traversed the room, but Tom sat still, with his arms upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1780"></td>
        <td id="LC1780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the long, low desk before him, and seemed to study his book.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1781"></td>
        <td id="LC1781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1782"></td>
        <td id="LC1782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By and by attention ceased from him, and the accustomed school murmur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1783"></td>
        <td id="LC1783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose upon the dull air once more. Presently the boy began to steal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1784"></td>
        <td id="LC1784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furtive glances at the girl. She observed it, &quot;made a mouth&quot; at him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1785"></td>
        <td id="LC1785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave him the back of her head for the space of a minute. When she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1786"></td>
        <td id="LC1786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cautiously faced around again, a peach lay before her. She thrust it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1787"></td>
        <td id="LC1787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away. Tom gently put it back. She thrust it away again, but with less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1788"></td>
        <td id="LC1788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animosity. Tom patiently returned it to its place. Then she let it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1789"></td>
        <td id="LC1789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remain. Tom scrawled on his slate, &quot;Please take it--I got more.&quot; The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1790"></td>
        <td id="LC1790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl glanced at the words, but made no sign. Now the boy began to draw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1791"></td>
        <td id="LC1791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something on the slate, hiding his work with his left hand. For a time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1792"></td>
        <td id="LC1792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the girl refused to notice; but her human curiosity presently began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1793"></td>
        <td id="LC1793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manifest itself by hardly perceptible signs. The boy worked on,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1794"></td>
        <td id="LC1794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apparently unconscious. The girl made a sort of noncommittal attempt to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1795"></td>
        <td id="LC1795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see, but the boy did not betray that he was aware of it. At last she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1796"></td>
        <td id="LC1796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave in and hesitatingly whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1797"></td>
        <td id="LC1797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1798"></td>
        <td id="LC1798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let me see it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1799"></td>
        <td id="LC1799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1800"></td>
        <td id="LC1800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom partly uncovered a dismal caricature of a house with two gable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1801"></td>
        <td id="LC1801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ends to it and a corkscrew of smoke issuing from the chimney. Then the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1802"></td>
        <td id="LC1802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl&#39;s interest began to fasten itself upon the work and she forgot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1803"></td>
        <td id="LC1803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything else. When it was finished, she gazed a moment, then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1804"></td>
        <td id="LC1804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1805"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1806"></td>
        <td id="LC1806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s nice--make a man.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1807"></td>
        <td id="LC1807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1808"></td>
        <td id="LC1808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The artist erected a man in the front yard, that resembled a derrick.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1809"></td>
        <td id="LC1809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He could have stepped over the house; but the girl was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1810"></td>
        <td id="LC1810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hypercritical; she was satisfied with the monster, and whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1811"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1813"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1814"></td>
        <td id="LC1814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom drew an hour-glass with a full moon and straw limbs to it and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1815"></td>
        <td id="LC1815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">armed the spreading fingers with a portentous fan. The girl said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1816"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1820"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L1826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1826"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC1827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good--that&#39;s a whack. What&#39;s your name?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1828"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1830"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1833"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1834"></td>
        <td id="LC1834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1835"></td>
        <td id="LC1835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1836"></td>
        <td id="LC1836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now Tom began to scrawl something on the slate, hiding the words from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1837"></td>
        <td id="LC1837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the girl. But she was not backward this time. She begged to see. Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1838"></td>
        <td id="LC1838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1839"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1840"></td>

        <td id="L1841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1841"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1842"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1843"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1845"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1847"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1849"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1851"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1853"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1855"></td>
        <td id="LC1855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L1856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1856"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1857"></td>
        <td id="LC1857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1858"></td>
        <td id="LC1858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now that you treat me so, I WILL see.&quot; And she put her small hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1859"></td>
        <td id="LC1859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon his and a little scuffle ensued, Tom pretending to resist in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1860"></td>
        <td id="LC1860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earnest but letting his hand slip by degrees till these words were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1861"></td>
        <td id="LC1861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revealed: &quot;I LOVE YOU.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1862"></td>
        <td id="LC1862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1863"></td>
        <td id="LC1863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, you bad thing!&quot; And she hit his hand a smart rap, but reddened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1864"></td>
        <td id="LC1864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and looked pleased, nevertheless.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1865"></td>
        <td id="LC1865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1866"></td>
        <td id="LC1866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just at this juncture the boy felt a slow, fateful grip closing on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1867"></td>
        <td id="LC1867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ear, and a steady lifting impulse. In that vise he was borne across the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1868"></td>
        <td id="LC1868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house and deposited in his own seat, under a peppering fire of giggles</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1869"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1872"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1873"></td>
        <td id="LC1873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the school quieted down Tom made an honest effort to study, but the</td>

        <td id="L1874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1874"></td>

        <td id="L1883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1883"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1884"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1885"></td>
        <td id="LC1885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE harder Tom tried to fasten his mind on his book, the more his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1886"></td>
        <td id="LC1886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ideas wandered. So at last, with a sigh and a yawn, he gave it up. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1887"></td>
        <td id="LC1887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to him that the noon recess would never come. The air was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1888"></td>
        <td id="LC1888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utterly dead. There was not a breath stirring. It was the sleepiest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1889"></td>
        <td id="LC1889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleepy days. The drowsing murmur of the five and twenty studying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1890"></td>
        <td id="LC1890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scholars soothed the soul like the spell that is in the murmur of bees.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1891"></td>
        <td id="LC1891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Away off in the flaming sunshine, Cardiff Hill lifted its soft green</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1892"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2060"></td>
        <td id="LC2060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2061"></td>
        <td id="LC2061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, indeed, indeed I won&#39;t. Now, Becky.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2062"></td>
        <td id="LC2062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2063"></td>
        <td id="LC2063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He turned his face away. She bent timidly around till her breath</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2064"></td>
        <td id="LC2064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stirred his curls and whispered, &quot;I--love--you!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2065"></td>
        <td id="LC2065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2066"></td>
        <td id="LC2066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then she sprang away and ran around and around the desks and benches,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2067"></td>
        <td id="LC2067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with Tom after her, and took refuge in a corner at last, with her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2068"></td>
        <td id="LC2068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little white apron to her face. Tom clasped her about her neck and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2069"></td>
        <td id="LC2069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleaded:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2070"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2072"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2073"></td>
        <td id="LC2073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apron and the hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2074"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2075"></td>
        <td id="LC2075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By and by she gave up, and let her hands drop; her face, all glowing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2076"></td>
        <td id="LC2076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the struggle, came up and submitted. Tom kissed the red lips and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2077"></td>
        <td id="LC2077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:</td>

        <td id="L2078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2078"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2085"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2086"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2087"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2088"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The big eyes told Tom his blunder and he stopped, confused.</td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2102"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2104"></td>
        <td id="LC2104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2105"></td>
        <td id="LC2105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom tried to put his arm about her neck, but she pushed him away and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2106"></td>
        <td id="LC2106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned her face to the wall, and went on crying. Tom tried again, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2107"></td>
        <td id="LC2107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soothing words in his mouth, and was repulsed again. Then his pride was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2108"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2109"></td>
        <td id="LC2109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uneasy, for a while, glancing at the door, every now and then, hoping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2110"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2111"></td>
        <td id="LC2111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to feel badly and fear that he was in the wrong. It was a hard struggle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2112"></td>
        <td id="LC2112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him to make new advances, now, but he nerved himself to it and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2113"></td>
        <td id="LC2113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered. She was still standing back there in the corner, sobbing, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2114"></td>
        <td id="LC2114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her face to the wall. Tom&#39;s heart smote him. He went to her and stood a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2116"></td>
        <td id="LC2116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2117"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2118"></td>
        <td id="LC2118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2119"></td>
        <td id="LC2119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No reply--but sobs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2120"></td>
        <td id="LC2120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2121"></td>
        <td id="LC2121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Becky&quot;--pleadingly. &quot;Becky, won&#39;t you say something?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2122"></td>
        <td id="LC2122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2123"></td>
        <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">More sobs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2124"></td>
        <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2125"></td>
        <td id="LC2125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom got out his chiefest jewel, a brass knob from the top of an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2126"></td>
        <td id="LC2126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">andiron, and passed it around her so that she could see it, and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2127"></td>
        <td id="LC2127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2128"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2129"></td>
        <td id="LC2129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2130"></td>
        <td id="LC2130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She struck it to the floor. Then Tom marched out of the house and over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2131"></td>
        <td id="LC2131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hills and far away, to return to school no more that day. Presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2132"></td>
        <td id="LC2132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Becky began to suspect. She ran to the door; he was not in sight; she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2133"></td>
        <td id="LC2133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flew around to the play-yard; he was not there. Then she called:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2134"></td>
        <td id="LC2134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2135"></td>
        <td id="LC2135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom! Come back, Tom!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2137"></td>
        <td id="LC2137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She listened intently, but there was no answer. She had no companions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2138"></td>
        <td id="LC2138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but silence and loneliness. So she sat down to cry again and upbraid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2139"></td>
        <td id="LC2139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself; and by this time the scholars began to gather again, and she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2140"></td>
        <td id="LC2140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had to hide her griefs and still her broken heart and take up the cross</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2141"></td>
        <td id="LC2141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a long, dreary, aching afternoon, with none among the strangers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>
        <td id="LC2142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about her to exchange sorrows with.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2143"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2144"></td>
        <td id="LC2144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2145"></td>
        <td id="LC2145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2146"></td>
        <td id="LC2146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2147"></td>
        <td id="LC2147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM dodged hither and thither through lanes until he was well out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2148"></td>
        <td id="LC2148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the track of returning scholars, and then fell into a moody jog. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2149"></td>
        <td id="LC2149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crossed a small &quot;branch&quot; two or three times, because of a prevailing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2150"></td>
        <td id="LC2150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">juvenile superstition that to cross water baffled pursuit. Half an hour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2151"></td>
        <td id="LC2151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">later he was disappearing behind the Douglas mansion on the summit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2152"></td>
        <td id="LC2152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Cardiff Hill, and the schoolhouse was hardly distinguishable away off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2153"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2240"></td>
        <td id="LC2240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2241"></td>
        <td id="LC2241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The sand began to work, and presently a small black bug appeared for a</td>
      </tr>
