      <tr>
        <td id="L2243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2243"></td>
        <td id="LC2243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2244"></td>
        <td id="LC2244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;He dasn&#39;t tell! So it WAS a witch that done it. I just knowed it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2245"></td>
        <td id="LC2245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2246"></td>
        <td id="LC2246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He well knew the futility of trying to contend against witches, so he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2247"></td>
        <td id="LC2247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave up discouraged. But it occurred to him that he might as well have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2248"></td>
        <td id="LC2248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the marble he had just thrown away, and therefore he went and made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2249"></td>
        <td id="LC2249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patient search for it. But he could not find it. Now he went back to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2250"></td>
        <td id="LC2250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his treasure-house and carefully placed himself just as he had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2251"></td>
        <td id="LC2251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">standing when he tossed the marble away; then he took another marble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2252"></td>
        <td id="LC2252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from his pocket and tossed it in the same way, saying:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2253"></td>
        <td id="LC2253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2254"></td>
        <td id="LC2254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Brother, go find your brother!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2255"></td>
        <td id="LC2255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2256"></td>
        <td id="LC2256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He watched where it stopped, and went there and looked. But it must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2257"></td>
        <td id="LC2257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have fallen short or gone too far; so he tried twice more. The last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2258"></td>
        <td id="LC2258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repetition was successful. The two marbles lay within a foot of each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2259"></td>
        <td id="LC2259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2260"></td>
        <td id="LC2260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2261"></td>
        <td id="LC2261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just here the blast of a toy tin trumpet came faintly down the green</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2262"></td>
        <td id="LC2262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aisles of the forest. Tom flung off his jacket and trousers, turned a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2263"></td>
        <td id="LC2263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspender into a belt, raked away some brush behind the rotten log,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2264"></td>
        <td id="LC2264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disclosing a rude bow and arrow, a lath sword and a tin trumpet, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2265"></td>
        <td id="LC2265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a moment had seized these things and bounded away, barelegged, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2266"></td>
        <td id="LC2266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fluttering shirt. He presently halted under a great elm, blew an</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2268"></td>
        <td id="LC2268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that. He said cautiously--to an imaginary company:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2269"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2271"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2272"></td>

        <td id="L2273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2273"></td>
        <td id="LC2273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom called:</td>

</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2278"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2279"></td>
        <td id="LC2279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dares to hold such language,&quot; said Tom, prompting--for they talked</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;by the book,&quot; from memory.</td>

        <td id="L2281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2281"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2289"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2290"></td>
        <td id="LC2290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struck a fencing attitude, foot to foot, and began a grave, careful</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">combat, &quot;two up and two down.&quot; Presently Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2292"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2296"></td>
        <td id="LC2296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by Tom shouted:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2297"></td>
        <td id="LC2297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2298"></td>
        <td id="LC2298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Fall! fall! Why don&#39;t you fall?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2299"></td>
        <td id="LC2299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2300"></td>
        <td id="LC2300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I sha&#39;n&#39;t! Why don&#39;t you fall yourself? You&#39;re getting the worst of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2301"></td>
        <td id="LC2301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2302"></td>
        <td id="LC2302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2303"></td>
        <td id="LC2303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, that ain&#39;t anything. I can&#39;t fall; that ain&#39;t the way it is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2304"></td>
        <td id="LC2304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the book. The book says, &#39;Then with one back-handed stroke he slew poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2305"></td>
        <td id="LC2305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Guy of Guisborne.&#39; You&#39;re to turn around and let me hit you in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2306"></td>
        <td id="LC2306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2307"></td>
        <td id="LC2307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2308"></td>
        <td id="LC2308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was no getting around the authorities, so Joe turned, received</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2309"></td>
        <td id="LC2309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whack and fell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2310"></td>
        <td id="LC2310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2311"></td>
        <td id="LC2311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now,&quot; said Joe, getting up, &quot;you got to let me kill YOU. That&#39;s fair.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2312"></td>
        <td id="LC2312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2313"></td>
        <td id="LC2313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, I can&#39;t do that, it ain&#39;t in the book.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2314"></td>
        <td id="LC2314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2315"></td>
        <td id="LC2315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, it&#39;s blamed mean--that&#39;s all.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2316"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2317"></td>
        <td id="LC2317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, say, Joe, you can be Friar Tuck or Much the miller&#39;s son, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2318"></td>
        <td id="LC2318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lam me with a quarter-staff; or I&#39;ll be the Sheriff of Nottingham and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2319"></td>
        <td id="LC2319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you be Robin Hood a little while and kill me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2320"></td>
        <td id="LC2320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2321"></td>
        <td id="LC2321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was satisfactory, and so these adventures were carried out. Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2322"></td>
        <td id="LC2322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom became Robin Hood again, and was allowed by the treacherous nun to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2323"></td>
        <td id="LC2323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bleed his strength away through his neglected wound. And at last Joe,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2324"></td>
        <td id="LC2324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">representing a whole tribe of weeping outlaws, dragged him sadly forth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2325"></td>
        <td id="LC2325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave his bow into his feeble hands, and Tom said, &quot;Where this arrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2326"></td>
        <td id="LC2326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falls, there bury poor Robin Hood under the greenwood tree.&quot; Then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2327"></td>
        <td id="LC2327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shot the arrow and fell back and would have died, but he lit on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2328"></td>
        <td id="LC2328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nettle and sprang up too gaily for a corpse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2329"></td>
        <td id="LC2329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2330"></td>
        <td id="LC2330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys dressed themselves, hid their accoutrements, and went off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2331"></td>
        <td id="LC2331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grieving that there were no outlaws any more, and wondering what modern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2332"></td>
        <td id="LC2332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civilization could claim to have done to compensate for their loss.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2333"></td>
        <td id="LC2333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They said they would rather be outlaws a year in Sherwood Forest than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2334"></td>
        <td id="LC2334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">President of the United States forever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2335"></td>
        <td id="LC2335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2336"></td>
        <td id="LC2336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2337"></td>
        <td id="LC2337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2338"></td>
        <td id="LC2338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2339"></td>
        <td id="LC2339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AT half-past nine, that night, Tom and Sid were sent to bed, as usual.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2340"></td>
        <td id="LC2340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They said their prayers, and Sid was soon asleep. Tom lay awake and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2341"></td>
        <td id="LC2341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waited, in restless impatience. When it seemed to him that it must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2342"></td>
        <td id="LC2342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nearly daylight, he heard the clock strike ten! This was despair. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2343"></td>
        <td id="LC2343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would have tossed and fidgeted, as his nerves demanded, but he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2344"></td>
        <td id="LC2344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid he might wake Sid. So he lay still, and stared up into the dark.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2345"></td>
        <td id="LC2345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Everything was dismally still. By and by, out of the stillness, little,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2346"></td>
        <td id="LC2346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scarcely preceptible noises began to emphasize themselves. The ticking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2347"></td>
        <td id="LC2347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the clock began to bring itself into notice. Old beams began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2348"></td>
        <td id="LC2348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crack mysteriously. The stairs creaked faintly. Evidently spirits were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2349"></td>
        <td id="LC2349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abroad. A measured, muffled snore issued from Aunt Polly&#39;s chamber. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2350"></td>
        <td id="LC2350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now the tiresome chirping of a cricket that no human ingenuity could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2351"></td>
        <td id="LC2351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">locate, began. Next the ghastly ticking of a deathwatch in the wall at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2352"></td>
        <td id="LC2352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bed&#39;s head made Tom shudder--it meant that somebody&#39;s days were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2353"></td>
        <td id="LC2353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">numbered. Then the howl of a far-off dog rose on the night air, and was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2354"></td>
        <td id="LC2354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered by a fainter howl from a remoter distance. Tom was in an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2355"></td>
        <td id="LC2355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agony. At last he was satisfied that time had ceased and eternity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2356"></td>
        <td id="LC2356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begun; he began to doze, in spite of himself; the clock chimed eleven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2357"></td>
        <td id="LC2357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but he did not hear it. And then there came, mingling with his half-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2358"></td>
        <td id="LC2358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">formed dreams, a most melancholy caterwauling. The raising of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2359"></td>
        <td id="LC2359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighboring window disturbed him. A cry of &quot;Scat! you devil!&quot; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2360"></td>
        <td id="LC2360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crash of an empty bottle against the back of his aunt&#39;s woodshed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2361"></td>
        <td id="LC2361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought him wide awake, and a single minute later he was dressed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2362"></td>
        <td id="LC2362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the window and creeping along the roof of the &quot;ell&quot; on all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2363"></td>
        <td id="LC2363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fours. He &quot;meow&#39;d&quot; with caution once or twice, as he went; then jumped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2364"></td>
        <td id="LC2364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the roof of the woodshed and thence to the ground. Huckleberry Finn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2365"></td>
        <td id="LC2365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was there, with his dead cat. The boys moved off and disappeared in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2366"></td>
        <td id="LC2366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom. At the end of half an hour they were wading through the tall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2367"></td>
        <td id="LC2367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grass of the graveyard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2368"></td>
        <td id="LC2368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2369"></td>
        <td id="LC2369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a graveyard of the old-fashioned Western kind. It was on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2370"></td>
        <td id="LC2370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hill, about a mile and a half from the village. It had a crazy board</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2371"></td>
        <td id="LC2371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fence around it, which leaned inward in places, and outward the rest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2372"></td>
        <td id="LC2372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the time, but stood upright nowhere. Grass and weeds grew rank over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2373"></td>
        <td id="LC2373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole cemetery. All the old graves were sunken in, there was not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2374"></td>
        <td id="LC2374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tombstone on the place; round-topped, worm-eaten boards staggered over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2375"></td>
        <td id="LC2375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the graves, leaning for support and finding none. &quot;Sacred to the memory</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2376"></td>
        <td id="LC2376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of&quot; So-and-So had been painted on them once, but it could no longer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2377"></td>
        <td id="LC2377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been read, on the most of them, now, even if there had been light.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2378"></td>
        <td id="LC2378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2379"></td>
        <td id="LC2379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A faint wind moaned through the trees, and Tom feared it might be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2380"></td>
        <td id="LC2380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spirits of the dead, complaining at being disturbed. The boys talked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2381"></td>
        <td id="LC2381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little, and only under their breath, for the time and the place and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2382"></td>
        <td id="LC2382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pervading solemnity and silence oppressed their spirits. They found the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2383"></td>
        <td id="LC2383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sharp new heap they were seeking, and ensconced themselves within the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2384"></td>
        <td id="LC2384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protection of three great elms that grew in a bunch within a few feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2385"></td>
        <td id="LC2385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the grave.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2386"></td>
        <td id="LC2386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2387"></td>
        <td id="LC2387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then they waited in silence for what seemed a long time. The hooting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2388"></td>
        <td id="LC2388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a distant owl was all the sound that troubled the dead stillness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2389"></td>
        <td id="LC2389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom&#39;s reflections grew oppressive. He must force some talk. So he said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2390"></td>
        <td id="LC2390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a whisper:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2391"></td>
        <td id="LC2391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2392"></td>
        <td id="LC2392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hucky, do you believe the dead people like it for us to be here?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2393"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2394"></td>
        <td id="LC2394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huckleberry whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2395"></td>
        <td id="LC2395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2396"></td>
        <td id="LC2396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I wisht I knowed. It&#39;s awful solemn like, AIN&#39;T it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2397"></td>
        <td id="LC2397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2398"></td>
        <td id="LC2398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I bet it is.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2399"></td>
        <td id="LC2399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2400"></td>
        <td id="LC2400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a considerable pause, while the boys canvassed this matter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2401"></td>
        <td id="LC2401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inwardly. Then Tom whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2402"></td>
        <td id="LC2402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2403"></td>
        <td id="LC2403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Say, Hucky--do you reckon Hoss Williams hears us talking?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2404"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2406"></td>
        <td id="LC2406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2407"></td>
        <td id="LC2407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom, after a pause:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2408"></td>
        <td id="LC2408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2409"></td>
        <td id="LC2409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I wish I&#39;d said Mister Williams. But I never meant any harm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2410"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2412"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2413"></td>
        <td id="LC2413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people, Tom.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2414"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2415"></td>
        <td id="LC2415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was a damper, and conversation died again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2416"></td>
        <td id="LC2416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2417"></td>
        <td id="LC2417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently Tom seized his comrade&#39;s arm and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2418"></td>
        <td id="LC2418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2419"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2420"></td>
        <td id="LC2420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2421"></td>
        <td id="LC2421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What is it, Tom?&quot; And the two clung together with beating hearts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2422"></td>
        <td id="LC2422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2423"></td>
        <td id="LC2423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Sh! There &#39;tis again! Didn&#39;t you hear it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2424"></td>
        <td id="LC2424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2425"></td>
        <td id="LC2425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2426"></td>
        <td id="LC2426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2427"></td>
        <td id="LC2427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There! Now you hear it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2428"></td>
        <td id="LC2428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2429"></td>
        <td id="LC2429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lord, Tom, they&#39;re coming! They&#39;re coming, sure. What&#39;ll we do?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2430"></td>
        <td id="LC2430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2524"></td>
        <td id="LC2524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was threatening the doctor, with his fist in his face, by this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2525"></td>
        <td id="LC2525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. The doctor struck out suddenly and stretched the ruffian on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2526"></td>
        <td id="LC2526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground. Potter dropped his knife, and exclaimed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2527"></td>
        <td id="LC2527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2528"></td>
        <td id="LC2528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Here, now, don&#39;t you hit my pard!&quot; and the next moment he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2529"></td>
        <td id="LC2529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grappled with the doctor and the two were struggling with might and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2530"></td>
        <td id="LC2530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">main, trampling the grass and tearing the ground with their heels.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2531"></td>
        <td id="LC2531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Injun Joe sprang to his feet, his eyes flaming with passion, snatched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2532"></td>
        <td id="LC2532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up Potter&#39;s knife, and went creeping, catlike and stooping, round and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2533"></td>
        <td id="LC2533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round about the combatants, seeking an opportunity. All at once the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2534"></td>
        <td id="LC2534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doctor flung himself free, seized the heavy headboard of Williams&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2535"></td>
        <td id="LC2535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grave and felled Potter to the earth with it--and in the same instant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2536"></td>
        <td id="LC2536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the half-breed saw his chance and drove the knife to the hilt in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2537"></td>
        <td id="LC2537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young man&#39;s breast. He reeled and fell partly upon Potter, flooding him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2538"></td>
        <td id="LC2538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his blood, and in the same moment the clouds blotted out the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2539"></td>
        <td id="LC2539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful spectacle and the two frightened boys went speeding away in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2540"></td>
        <td id="LC2540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dark.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2541"></td>
        <td id="LC2541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2542"></td>
        <td id="LC2542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently, when the moon emerged again, Injun Joe was standing over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2543"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave a long gasp or two and was still. The half-breed muttered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2545"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2546"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2547"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2548"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2549"></td>
        <td id="LC2549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter&#39;s open right hand, and sat down on the dismantled coffin. Three--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2550"></td>
        <td id="LC2550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">four--five minutes passed, and then Potter began to stir and moan. His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand closed upon the knife; he raised it, glanced at it, and let it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2553"></td>
        <td id="LC2553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gazed at it, and then around him, confusedly. His eyes met Joe&#39;s.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2554"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter trembled and grew white.</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2599"></td>
        <td id="LC2599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter started on a trot that quickly increased to a run. The half-</td>

        <td id="L2601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2601"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2602"></td>
        <td id="LC2602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If he&#39;s as much stunned with the lick and fuddled with the rum as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2603"></td>
        <td id="LC2603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had the look of being, he won&#39;t think of the knife till he&#39;s gone so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2604"></td>
        <td id="LC2604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far he&#39;ll be afraid to come back after it to such a place by himself--</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2605"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2607"></td>
        <td id="LC2607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two or three minutes later the murdered man, the blanketed corpse, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2608"></td>
        <td id="LC2608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lidless coffin, and the open grave were under no inspection but the</td>

        <td id="L2609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2609"></td>
        <td id="LC2609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moon&#39;s. The stillness was complete again, too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2610"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2611"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2612"></td>
        <td id="LC2612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER X</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2613"></td>
        <td id="LC2613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2614"></td>
        <td id="LC2614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE two boys flew on and on, toward the village, speechless with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2615"></td>
        <td id="LC2615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horror. They glanced backward over their shoulders from time to time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2803"></td>
        <td id="LC2803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Sounds like--like hogs grunting. No--it&#39;s somebody snoring, Tom.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2804"></td>
        <td id="LC2804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2805"></td>
        <td id="LC2805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That IS it! Where &#39;bouts is it, Huck?&quot;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2806"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2807"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2808"></td>

        <td id="LC2818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom quailed. But presently the temptation rose up strong again and the</td>

        <td id="L2888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2888"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2892"></td>
        <td id="LC2892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2893"></td>
        <td id="LC2893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2894"></td>
        <td id="LC2894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CLOSE upon the hour of noon the whole village was suddenly electrified</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2895"></td>
        <td id="LC2895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the ghastly news. No need of the as yet undreamed-of telegraph;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2896"></td>
        <td id="LC2896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tale flew from man to man, from group to group, from house to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2897"></td>
        <td id="LC2897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, with little less than telegraphic speed. Of course the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2898"></td>
        <td id="LC2898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">schoolmaster gave holiday for that afternoon; the town would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2899"></td>
        <td id="LC2899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought strangely of him if he had not.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2900"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2901"></td>
        <td id="LC2901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A gory knife had been found close to the murdered man, and it had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2902"></td>
        <td id="LC2902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recognized by somebody as belonging to Muff Potter--so the story ran.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2903"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2904"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2905"></td>
        <td id="LC2905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Potter had at once sneaked off--suspicious circumstances,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2906"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2907"></td>
        <td id="LC2907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said that the town had been ransacked for this &quot;murderer&quot; (the public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2908"></td>
        <td id="LC2908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are not slow in the matter of sifting evidence and arriving at a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2909"></td>
        <td id="LC2909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">verdict), but that he could not be found. Horsemen had departed down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2910"></td>
        <td id="LC2910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the roads in every direction, and the Sheriff &quot;was confident&quot; that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2911"></td>
        <td id="LC2911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he would be captured before night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2912"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2913"></td>
        <td id="LC2913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All the town was drifting toward the graveyard. Tom&#39;s heartbreak</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2914"></td>
        <td id="LC2914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vanished and he joined the procession, not because he would not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2915"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2916"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2920"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2924"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2929"></td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2944"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2945"></td>

        <td id="L2946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2946"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2955"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2956"></td>
        <td id="LC2956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This shot seemed to carry home. Potter lifted his face and looked</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2962"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2963"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2964"></td>
        <td id="LC2964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter would have fallen if they had not caught him and eased him to</td>

        <td id="L2966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2966"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;em, Joe, tell &#39;em--it ain&#39;t any use any more.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2971"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>
        <td id="LC2972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hearted liar reel off his serene statement, they expecting every moment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2973"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>
        <td id="LC2976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">break their oath and save the poor betrayed prisoner&#39;s life faded and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2977"></td>
        <td id="LC2977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vanished away, for plainly this miscreant had sold himself to Satan and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it would be fatal to meddle with the property of such a power as that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>
        <td id="LC2979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>
        <td id="LC2980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why didn&#39;t you leave? What did you want to come here for?&quot; somebody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>
        <td id="LC2981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2982"></td>
        <td id="LC2982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2983"></td>
        <td id="LC2983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I couldn&#39;t help it--I couldn&#39;t help it,&quot; Potter moaned. &quot;I wanted to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2984"></td>
        <td id="LC2984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">run away, but I couldn&#39;t seem to come anywhere but here.&quot; And he fell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2985"></td>
        <td id="LC2985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to sobbing again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2986"></td>
        <td id="LC2986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3069"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3070"></td>
        <td id="LC3070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ONE of the reasons why Tom&#39;s mind had drifted away from its secret</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3071"></td>

        <td id="LC3072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">itself about. Becky Thatcher had stopped coming to school. Tom had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3073"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3075"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3076"></td>
        <td id="LC3076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should die! There was distraction in the thought. He no longer took an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3077"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3078"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3079"></td>
        <td id="LC3079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was no joy in them any more. His aunt was concerned. She began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3080"></td>
        <td id="LC3080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try all manner of remedies on him. She was one of those people who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3081"></td>
        <td id="LC3081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">infatuated with patent medicines and all new-fangled methods of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3082"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3083"></td>
        <td id="LC3083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these things. When something fresh in this line came out she was in a</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3084"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3085"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3087"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3264"></td>

        <td id="LC3448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3449"></td>
        <td id="LC3449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh yes, that&#39;s so,&quot; said Joe, &quot;but I hadn&#39;t thought much about it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3450"></td>
        <td id="LC3450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you know. I&#39;d a good deal rather be a pirate, now that I&#39;ve tried it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3451"></td>
        <td id="LC3451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3452"></td>
        <td id="LC3452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You see,&quot; said Tom, &quot;people don&#39;t go much on hermits, nowadays, like</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3453"></td>
        <td id="LC3453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they used to in old times, but a pirate&#39;s always respected. And a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3454"></td>
        <td id="LC3454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hermit&#39;s got to sleep on the hardest place he can find, and put</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sackcloth and ashes on his head, and stand out in the rain, and--&quot;</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC3475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Red-Handed made no response, being better employed. He had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3476"></td>

        <td id="L3481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3481"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3485"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3487"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3497"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3499"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3500"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3501"></td>
        <td id="LC3501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3502"></td>

        <td id="L3503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3503"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3504"></td>
        <td id="LC3504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck scanned his own clothing forlornly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3505"></td>
        <td id="LC3505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC3506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I reckon I ain&#39;t dressed fitten for a pirate,&quot; said he, with a</td>

        <td id="L3507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3507"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3509"></td>
        <td id="LC3509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the other boys told him the fine clothes would come fast enough,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3510"></td>
        <td id="LC3510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after they should have begun their adventures. They made him understand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3511"></td>
        <td id="LC3511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that his poor rags would do to begin with, though it was customary for</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3512"></td>
        <td id="LC3512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wealthy pirates to start with a proper wardrobe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3513"></td>
        <td id="LC3513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3514"></td>
        <td id="LC3514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gradually their talk died out and drowsiness began to steal upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3515"></td>
        <td id="LC3515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyelids of the little waifs. The pipe dropped from the fingers of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3516"></td>
        <td id="LC3516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Red-Handed, and he slept the sleep of the conscience-free and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3517"></td>
        <td id="LC3517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weary. The Terror of the Seas and the Black Avenger of the Spanish Main</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3518"></td>
        <td id="LC3518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had more difficulty in getting to sleep. They said their prayers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3519"></td>
        <td id="LC3519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inwardly, and lying down, since there was nobody there with authority</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3520"></td>
        <td id="LC3520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to make them kneel and recite aloud; in truth, they had a mind not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3521"></td>
        <td id="LC3521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say them at all, but they were afraid to proceed to such lengths as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3522"></td>
        <td id="LC3522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, lest they might call down a sudden and special thunderbolt from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3523"></td>
        <td id="LC3523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heaven. Then at once they reached and hovered upon the imminent verge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3524"></td>
        <td id="LC3524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of sleep--but an intruder came, now, that would not &quot;down.&quot; It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3525"></td>
        <td id="LC3525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscience. They began to feel a vague fear that they had been doing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3526"></td>
        <td id="LC3526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrong to run away; and next they thought of the stolen meat, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3527"></td>
        <td id="LC3527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the real torture came. They tried to argue it away by reminding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3528"></td>
        <td id="LC3528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscience that they had purloined sweetmeats and apples scores of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3529"></td>
        <td id="LC3529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times; but conscience was not to be appeased by such thin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3530"></td>
        <td id="LC3530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plausibilities; it seemed to them, in the end, that there was no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3531"></td>
        <td id="LC3531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting around the stubborn fact that taking sweetmeats was only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3532"></td>
        <td id="LC3532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;hooking,&quot; while taking bacon and hams and such valuables was plain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3533"></td>
        <td id="LC3533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simple stealing--and there was a command against that in the Bible. So</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3534"></td>
        <td id="LC3534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they inwardly resolved that so long as they remained in the business,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3535"></td>
        <td id="LC3535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their piracies should not again be sullied with the crime of stealing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3536"></td>
        <td id="LC3536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then conscience granted a truce, and these curiously inconsistent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3537"></td>
        <td id="LC3537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pirates fell peacefully to sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3538"></td>
        <td id="LC3538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3539"></td>
        <td id="LC3539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3540"></td>
        <td id="LC3540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XIV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3541"></td>
        <td id="LC3541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3542"></td>
        <td id="LC3542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">WHEN Tom awoke in the morning, he wondered where he was. He sat up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3543"></td>
        <td id="LC3543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rubbed his eyes and looked around. Then he comprehended. It was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3544"></td>
        <td id="LC3544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cool gray dawn, and there was a delicious sense of repose and peace in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3545"></td>
        <td id="LC3545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the deep pervading calm and silence of the woods. Not a leaf stirred;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3546"></td>
        <td id="LC3546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not a sound obtruded upon great Nature&#39;s meditation. Beaded dewdrops</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3547"></td>
        <td id="LC3547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood upon the leaves and grasses. A white layer of ashes covered the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3548"></td>
        <td id="LC3548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire, and a thin blue breath of smoke rose straight into the air. Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3549"></td>
        <td id="LC3549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Huck still slept.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3550"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3551"></td>
        <td id="LC3551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, far away in the woods a bird called; another answered; presently</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3554"></td>

        <td id="L3565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3565"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3622"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3629"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3630"></td>
        <td id="LC3630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to drag, and then died. The stillness, the solemnity that brooded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3631"></td>
        <td id="LC3631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the woods, and the sense of loneliness, began to tell upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3632"></td>
