        <td id="L3724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3724"></td>
        <td id="LC3724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grew troubled and unhappy; a sigh or two escaped, unawares. By and by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3725"></td>
        <td id="LC3725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe timidly ventured upon a roundabout &quot;feeler&quot; as to how the others</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3726"></td>
        <td id="LC3726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might look upon a return to civilization--not right now, but--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3727"></td>
        <td id="LC3727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3728"></td>
        <td id="LC3728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom withered him with derision! Huck, being uncommitted as yet, joined</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3729"></td>
        <td id="LC3729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in with Tom, and the waverer quickly &quot;explained,&quot; and was glad to get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3730"></td>
        <td id="LC3730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the scrape with as little taint of chicken-hearted homesickness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3731"></td>
        <td id="LC3731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clinging to his garments as he could. Mutiny was effectually laid to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3732"></td>
        <td id="LC3732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest for the moment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3733"></td>
        <td id="LC3733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3734"></td>
        <td id="LC3734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the night deepened, Huck began to nod, and presently to snore. Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3735"></td>
        <td id="LC3735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">followed next. Tom lay upon his elbow motionless, for some time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3736"></td>
        <td id="LC3736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watching the two intently. At last he got up cautiously, on his knees,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3737"></td>
        <td id="LC3737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and went searching among the grass and the flickering reflections flung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3738"></td>
        <td id="LC3738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the camp-fire. He picked up and inspected several large semi-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>
        <td id="LC3739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cylinders of the thin white bark of a sycamore, and finally chose two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>
        <td id="LC3740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which seemed to suit him. Then he knelt by the fire and painfully wrote</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3741"></td>
        <td id="LC3741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something upon each of these with his &quot;red keel&quot;; one he rolled up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>
        <td id="LC3742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put in his jacket pocket, and the other he put in Joe&#39;s hat and removed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3743"></td>
        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it to a little distance from the owner. And he also put into the hat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3744"></td>
        <td id="LC3744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain schoolboy treasures of almost inestimable value--among them a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>
        <td id="LC3745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lump of chalk, an India-rubber ball, three fishhooks, and one of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3746"></td>
        <td id="LC3746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind of marbles known as a &quot;sure &#39;nough crystal.&quot; Then he tiptoed his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3747"></td>
        <td id="LC3747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way cautiously among the trees till he felt that he was out of hearing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3748"></td>
        <td id="LC3748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and straightway broke into a keen run in the direction of the sandbar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3749"></td>
        <td id="LC3749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3750"></td>
        <td id="LC3750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3751"></td>
        <td id="LC3751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3752"></td>
        <td id="LC3752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3753"></td>
        <td id="LC3753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A FEW minutes later Tom was in the shoal water of the bar, wading</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>
        <td id="LC3754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">toward the Illinois shore. Before the depth reached his middle he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>
        <td id="LC3755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half-way over; the current would permit no more wading, now, so he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3756"></td>
        <td id="LC3756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struck out confidently to swim the remaining hundred yards. He swam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>
        <td id="LC3757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quartering upstream, but still was swept downward rather faster than he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3758"></td>
        <td id="LC3758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had expected. However, he reached the shore finally, and drifted along</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till he found a low place and drew himself out. He put his hand on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>
        <td id="LC3760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jacket pocket, found his piece of bark safe, and then struck through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3761"></td>
        <td id="LC3761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the woods, following the shore, with streaming garments. Shortly before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>
        <td id="LC3762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ten o&#39;clock he came out into an open place opposite the village, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw the ferryboat lying in the shadow of the trees and the high bank.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>
        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Everything was quiet under the blinking stars. He crept down the bank,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>
        <td id="LC3765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watching with all his eyes, slipped into the water, swam three or four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3766"></td>
        <td id="LC3766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strokes and climbed into the skiff that did &quot;yawl&quot; duty at the boat&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3767"></td>
        <td id="LC3767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stern. He laid himself down under the thwarts and waited, panting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3768"></td>
        <td id="LC3768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3769"></td>
        <td id="LC3769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently the cracked bell tapped and a voice gave the order to &quot;cast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3770"></td>
        <td id="LC3770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off.&quot; A minute or two later the skiff&#39;s head was standing high up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3771"></td>
        <td id="LC3771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the boat&#39;s swell, and the voyage was begun. Tom felt happy in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>
        <td id="LC3772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his success, for he knew it was the boat&#39;s last trip for the night. At</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3773"></td>
        <td id="LC3773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the end of a long twelve or fifteen minutes the wheels stopped, and Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3774"></td>
        <td id="LC3774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slipped overboard and swam ashore in the dusk, landing fifty yards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3775"></td>
        <td id="LC3775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">downstream, out of danger of possible stragglers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3776"></td>
        <td id="LC3776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3777"></td>
        <td id="LC3777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He flew along unfrequented alleys, and shortly found himself at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3778"></td>
        <td id="LC3778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aunt&#39;s back fence. He climbed over, approached the &quot;ell,&quot; and looked in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>
        <td id="LC3779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the sitting-room window, for a light was burning there. There sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3780"></td>
        <td id="LC3780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Polly, Sid, Mary, and Joe Harper&#39;s mother, grouped together,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3781"></td>
        <td id="LC3781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talking. They were by the bed, and the bed was between them and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3782"></td>
        <td id="LC3782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door. Tom went to the door and began to softly lift the latch; then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3783"></td>
        <td id="LC3783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pressed gently and the door yielded a crack; he continued pushing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3784"></td>
        <td id="LC3784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cautiously, and quaking every time it creaked, till he judged he might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3785"></td>
        <td id="LC3785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">squeeze through on his knees; so he put his head through and began,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3786"></td>
        <td id="LC3786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warily.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3787"></td>
        <td id="LC3787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3788"></td>
        <td id="LC3788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What makes the candle blow so?&quot; said Aunt Polly. Tom hurried up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3789"></td>
        <td id="LC3789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, that door&#39;s open, I believe. Why, of course it is. No end of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3790"></td>
        <td id="LC3790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange things now. Go &#39;long and shut it, Sid.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3791"></td>
        <td id="LC3791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3792"></td>
        <td id="LC3792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom disappeared under the bed just in time. He lay and &quot;breathed&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3793"></td>
        <td id="LC3793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself for a time, and then crept to where he could almost touch his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3794"></td>
        <td id="LC3794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aunt&#39;s foot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3795"></td>
        <td id="LC3795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3796"></td>
        <td id="LC3796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But as I was saying,&quot; said Aunt Polly, &quot;he warn&#39;t BAD, so to say--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3797"></td>
        <td id="LC3797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only mischEEvous. Only just giddy, and harum-scarum, you know. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3798"></td>
        <td id="LC3798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warn&#39;t any more responsible than a colt. HE never meant any harm, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3799"></td>
        <td id="LC3799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was the best-hearted boy that ever was&quot;--and she began to cry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3800"></td>
        <td id="LC3800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3801"></td>
        <td id="LC3801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It was just so with my Joe--always full of his devilment, and up to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3802"></td>
        <td id="LC3802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every kind of mischief, but he was just as unselfish and kind as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3803"></td>
        <td id="LC3803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could be--and laws bless me, to think I went and whipped him for taking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3804"></td>
        <td id="LC3804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that cream, never once recollecting that I throwed it out myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3805"></td>
        <td id="LC3805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because it was sour, and I never to see him again in this world, never,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3806"></td>
        <td id="LC3806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never, never, poor abused boy!&quot; And Mrs. Harper sobbed as if her heart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3807"></td>
        <td id="LC3807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would break.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3808"></td>
        <td id="LC3808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3809"></td>
        <td id="LC3809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I hope Tom&#39;s better off where he is,&quot; said Sid, &quot;but if he&#39;d been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3810"></td>
        <td id="LC3810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better in some ways--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3811"></td>
        <td id="LC3811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3812"></td>
        <td id="LC3812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;SID!&quot; Tom felt the glare of the old lady&#39;s eye, though he could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3813"></td>
        <td id="LC3813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see it. &quot;Not a word against my Tom, now that he&#39;s gone! God&#39;ll take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3814"></td>
        <td id="LC3814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care of HIM--never you trouble YOURself, sir! Oh, Mrs. Harper, I don&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3815"></td>
        <td id="LC3815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know how to give him up! I don&#39;t know how to give him up! He was such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3816"></td>
        <td id="LC3816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comfort to me, although he tormented my old heart out of me, &#39;most.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3817"></td>
        <td id="LC3817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3818"></td>
        <td id="LC3818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The Lord giveth and the Lord hath taken away--Blessed be the name of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3819"></td>
        <td id="LC3819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Lord! But it&#39;s so hard--Oh, it&#39;s so hard! Only last Saturday my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3820"></td>
        <td id="LC3820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe busted a firecracker right under my nose and I knocked him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3821"></td>
        <td id="LC3821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sprawling. Little did I know then, how soon--Oh, if it was to do over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>
        <td id="LC3823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3824"></td>
        <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, yes, yes, I know just how you feel, Mrs. Harper, I know just</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3825"></td>
        <td id="LC3825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exactly how you feel. No longer ago than yesterday noon, my Tom took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3826"></td>
        <td id="LC3826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and filled the cat full of Pain-killer, and I did think the cretur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3827"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with my thimble, poor boy, poor dead boy. But he&#39;s out of all his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">troubles now. And the last words I ever heard him say was to reproach--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3830"></td>
        <td id="LC3830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3831"></td>
        <td id="LC3831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But this memory was too much for the old lady, and she broke entirely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3832"></td>
        <td id="LC3832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down. Tom was snuffling, now, himself--and more in pity of himself than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3833"></td>
        <td id="LC3833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anybody else. He could hear Mary crying, and putting in a kindly word</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3834"></td>
        <td id="LC3834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for him from time to time. He began to have a nobler opinion of himself</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grief to long to rush out from under the bed and overwhelm her with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3837"></td>
        <td id="LC3837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">joy--and the theatrical gorgeousness of the thing appealed strongly to</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3840"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3841"></td>
        <td id="LC3841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjectured at first that the boys had got drowned while taking a swim;</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3857"></td>
        <td id="LC3857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Harper gave a sobbing good-night and turned to go. Then with a</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3875"></td>
        <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face lighted with a happy solution of his thought; he put the bark</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3877"></td>
        <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straightway made his stealthy exit, latching the door behind him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3878"></td>
        <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3879"></td>
        <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He threaded his way back to the ferry landing, found nobody at large</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3881"></td>
        <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tenantless except that there was a watchman, who always turned in and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3882"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3890"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3891"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3892"></td>
        <td id="LC3892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He sat down and took a long rest, torturing himself meanwhile to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3894"></td>
        <td id="LC3894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spent. It was broad daylight before he found himself fairly abreast the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3895"></td>
        <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">island bar. He rested again until the sun was well up and gilding the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3896"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3897"></td>
        <td id="LC3897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little later he paused, dripping, upon the threshold of the camp, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3898"></td>
        <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard Joe say:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3899"></td>
        <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>
        <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, Tom&#39;s true-blue, Huck, and he&#39;ll come back. He won&#39;t desert. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knows that would be a disgrace to a pirate, and Tom&#39;s too proud for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>
        <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that sort of thing. He&#39;s up to something or other. Now I wonder what?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>
        <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3904"></td>
        <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, the things is ours, anyway, ain&#39;t they?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3905"></td>
        <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3906"></td>
        <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pretty near, but not yet, Huck. The writing says they are if he ain&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3907"></td>
        <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back here to breakfast.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>
        <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>
        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Which he is!&quot; exclaimed Tom, with fine dramatic effect, stepping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>
        <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grandly into camp.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A sumptuous breakfast of bacon and fish was shortly provided, and as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the boys set to work upon it, Tom recounted (and adorned) his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adventures. They were a vain and boastful company of heroes when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tale was done. Then Tom hid himself away in a shady nook to sleep till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noon, and the other pirates got ready to fish and explore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AFTER dinner all the gang turned out to hunt for turtle eggs on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bar. They went about poking sticks into the sand, and when they found a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soft place they went down on their knees and dug with their hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sometimes they would take fifty or sixty eggs out of one hole. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were perfectly round white things a trifle smaller than an English</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walnut. They had a famous fried-egg feast that night, and another on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Friday morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After breakfast they went whooping and prancing out on the bar, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>
        <td id="LC3930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chased each other round and round, shedding clothes as they went, until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were naked, and then continued the frolic far away up the shoal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>
        <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water of the bar, against the stiff current, which latter tripped their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">legs from under them from time to time and greatly increased the fun.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now and then they stooped in a group and splashed water in each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other&#39;s faces with their palms, gradually approaching each other, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">averted faces to avoid the strangling sprays, and finally gripping and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggling till the best man ducked his neighbor, and then they all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>
        <td id="LC3938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went under in a tangle of white legs and arms and came up blowing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>
        <td id="LC3939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sputtering, laughing, and gasping for breath at one and the same time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>
        <td id="LC3940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and by break for the water again and go through the original</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skin represented flesh-colored &quot;tights&quot; very fairly; so they drew a</td>

        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would yield this proudest post to his neighbor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next they got their marbles and played &quot;knucks&quot; and &quot;ring-taw&quot; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swim, but Tom would not venture, because he found that in kicking off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his trousers he had kicked his string of rattlesnake rattles off his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ankle, and he wondered how he had escaped cramp so long without the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protection of this mysterious charm. He did not venture again until he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had found it, and by that time the other boys were tired and ready to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest. They gradually wandered apart, dropped into the &quot;dumps,&quot; and fell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to gazing longingly across the wide river to where the village lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drowsing in the sun. Tom found himself writing &quot;BECKY&quot; in the sand with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his big toe; he scratched it out, and was angry with himself for his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakness. But he wrote it again, nevertheless; he could not help it. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">erased it once more and then took himself out of temptation by driving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Joe&#39;s spirits had gone down almost beyond resurrection. He was so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>
        <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">homesick that he could hardly endure the misery of it. The tears lay</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheerfulness:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3971"></td>
        <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3972"></td>
        <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I bet there&#39;s been pirates on this island before, boys. We&#39;ll explore</td>

        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>
        <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom tried one or two other seductions; but they failed, too. It was</td>

        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>

        <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3980"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3988"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3989"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>
        <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>
        <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, shucks! Baby! You want to see your mother, I reckon.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3994"></td>
        <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>
        <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, I DO want to see my mother--and you would, too, if you had one.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>
        <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I ain&#39;t any more baby than you are.&quot; And Joe snuffled a little.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>
        <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, we&#39;ll let the cry-baby go home to his mother, won&#39;t we, Huck?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3999"></td>
        <td id="LC3999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Poor thing--does it want to see its mother? And so it shall. You like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4000"></td>
        <td id="LC4000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it here, don&#39;t you, Huck? We&#39;ll stay, won&#39;t we?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4001"></td>
        <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4002"></td>
        <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck said, &quot;Y-e-s&quot;--without any heart in it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4003"></td>
        <td id="LC4003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4004"></td>
        <td id="LC4004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;ll never speak to you again as long as I live,&quot; said Joe, rising.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4005"></td>
        <td id="LC4005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There now!&quot; And he moved moodily away and began to dress himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4006"></td>
        <td id="LC4006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4007"></td>
        <td id="LC4007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Who cares!&quot; said Tom. &quot;Nobody wants you to. Go &#39;long home and get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>
        <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughed at. Oh, you&#39;re a nice pirate. Huck and me ain&#39;t cry-babies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>
        <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We&#39;ll stay, won&#39;t we, Huck? Let him go if he wants to. I reckon we can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get along without him, per&#39;aps.&quot;</td>

        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>
        <td id="LC4012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Tom was uneasy, nevertheless, and was alarmed to see Joe go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sullenly on with his dressing. And then it was discomforting to see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4014"></td>
        <td id="LC4014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck eying Joe&#39;s preparations so wistfully, and keeping up such an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ominous silence. Presently, without a parting word, Joe began to wade</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4016"></td>
        <td id="LC4016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off toward the Illinois shore. Tom&#39;s heart began to sink. He glanced at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4017"></td>
        <td id="LC4017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck. Huck could not bear the look, and dropped his eyes. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L4019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4019"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4035"></td>
        <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck started sorrowfully away, and Tom stood looking after him, with a</td>

        <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4036"></td>
        <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong desire tugging at his heart to yield his pride and go along too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He hoped the boys would stop, but they still waded slowly on. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4038"></td>
        <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suddenly dawned on Tom that it was become very lonely and still. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4039"></td>
        <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made one final struggle with his pride, and then darted after his</td>

        <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4040"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4044"></td>
        <td id="LC4044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They presently stopped and turned around. When he got to where they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4045"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4053"></td>
        <td id="LC4053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The lads came gayly back and went at their sports again with a will,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4054"></td>
        <td id="LC4054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chattering all the time about Tom&#39;s stupendous plan and admiring the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4055"></td>
        <td id="LC4055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">genius of it. After a dainty egg and fish dinner, Tom said he wanted to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4056"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4057"></td>

        <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4058"></td>
        <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smoked anything before but cigars made of grape-vine, and they &quot;bit&quot;</td>

        <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4060"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4061"></td>
        <td id="LC4061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now they stretched themselves out on their elbows and began to puff,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4062"></td>

        <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4063"></td>

        <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4064"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4065"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4081"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4083"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4084"></td>
        <td id="LC4084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alley. No, &#39;twas the day before.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4085"></td>
        <td id="LC4085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4086"></td>
        <td id="LC4086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There--I told you so,&quot; said Tom. &quot;Huck recollects it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4087"></td>
        <td id="LC4087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4088"></td>

        <td id="LC4171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaves.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4173"></td>
        <td id="LC4173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Quick! boys, go for the tent!&quot; exclaimed Tom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4174"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4175"></td>
        <td id="LC4175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They sprang away, stumbling over roots and among vines in the dark, no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4176"></td>
        <td id="LC4176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two plunging in the same direction. A furious blast roared through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4177"></td>
        <td id="LC4177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trees, making everything sing as it went. One blinding flash after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4178"></td>
        <td id="LC4178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another came, and peal on peal of deafening thunder. And now a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4179"></td>
        <td id="LC4179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drenching rain poured down and the rising hurricane drove it in sheets</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4180"></td>
        <td id="LC4180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along the ground. The boys cried out to each other, but the roaring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4181"></td>
        <td id="LC4181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wind and the booming thunder-blasts drowned their voices utterly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4182"></td>
        <td id="LC4182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">However, one by one they straggled in at last and took shelter under</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4183"></td>
        <td id="LC4183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tent, cold, scared, and streaming with water; but to have company</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4184"></td>
        <td id="LC4184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in misery seemed something to be grateful for. They could not talk, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4185"></td>
        <td id="LC4185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old sail flapped so furiously, even if the other noises would have</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4186"></td>
        <td id="LC4186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowed them. The tempest rose higher and higher, and presently the</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4188"></td>

        <td id="L4190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4190"></td>
        <td id="LC4190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now the battle was at its highest. Under the ceaseless conflagration of</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L4254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4254"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4266"></td>
        <td id="LC4266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4267"></td>
        <td id="LC4267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4268"></td>
        <td id="LC4268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BUT there was no hilarity in the little town that same tranquil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4269"></td>
        <td id="LC4269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Saturday afternoon. The Harpers, and Aunt Polly&#39;s family, were being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4270"></td>
        <td id="LC4270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put into mourning, with great grief and many tears. An unusual quiet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4271"></td>
        <td id="LC4271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possessed the village, although it was ordinarily quiet enough, in all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4272"></td>
        <td id="LC4272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscience. The villagers conducted their concerns with an absent air,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4273"></td>
        <td id="LC4273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and talked little; but they sighed often. The Saturday holiday seemed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4274"></td>
        <td id="LC4274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burden to the children. They had no heart in their sports, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4275"></td>
        <td id="LC4275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gradually gave them up.</td>

        <td id="L4276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4276"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4277"></td>
        <td id="LC4277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the afternoon Becky Thatcher found herself moping about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4278"></td>
        <td id="LC4278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deserted schoolhouse yard, and feeling very melancholy. But she found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4279"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4280"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4281"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4283"></td>
        <td id="LC4283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4284"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4285"></td>
        <td id="LC4285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4286"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4289"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4290"></td>
        <td id="LC4290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This thought broke her down, and she wandered away, with tears rolling</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L4357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4357"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC4362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started to slink away, but Tom seized him and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4363"></td>
        <td id="LC4363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4364"></td>
        <td id="LC4364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Aunt Polly, it ain&#39;t fair. Somebody&#39;s got to be glad to see Huck.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4365"></td>
        <td id="LC4365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4366"></td>
        <td id="LC4366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And so they shall. I&#39;m glad to see him, poor motherless thing!&quot; And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4367"></td>
        <td id="LC4367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the loving attentions Aunt Polly lavished upon him were the one thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4368"></td>
        <td id="LC4368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capable of making him more uncomfortable than he was before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4369"></td>
        <td id="LC4369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4370"></td>
        <td id="LC4370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly the minister shouted at the top of his voice: &quot;Praise God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4371"></td>
        <td id="LC4371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from whom all blessings flow--SING!--and put your hearts in it!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4372"></td>
        <td id="LC4372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4373"></td>
        <td id="LC4373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And they did. Old Hundred swelled up with a triumphant burst, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4374"></td>
        <td id="LC4374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while it shook the rafters Tom Sawyer the Pirate looked around upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4375"></td>
        <td id="LC4375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">envying juveniles about him and confessed in his heart that this was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4376"></td>
        <td id="LC4376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the proudest moment of his life.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4377"></td>
        <td id="LC4377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4378"></td>
        <td id="LC4378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the &quot;sold&quot; congregation trooped out they said they would almost be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4379"></td>
        <td id="LC4379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">willing to be made ridiculous again to hear Old Hundred sung like that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4380"></td>
        <td id="LC4380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4381"></td>
        <td id="LC4381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4382"></td>
        <td id="LC4382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom got more cuffs and kisses that day--according to Aunt Polly&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4383"></td>
        <td id="LC4383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">varying moods--than he had earned before in a year; and he hardly knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4384"></td>
        <td id="LC4384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which expressed the most gratefulness to God and affection for himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4385"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4386"></td>
