</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4387"></td>
        <td id="LC4387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4388"></td>
        <td id="LC4388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4389"></td>
        <td id="LC4389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THAT was Tom&#39;s great secret--the scheme to return home with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4390"></td>
        <td id="LC4390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brother pirates and attend their own funerals. They had paddled over to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4391"></td>
        <td id="LC4391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Missouri shore on a log, at dusk on Saturday, landing five or six</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4392"></td>
        <td id="LC4392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miles below the village; they had slept in the woods at the edge of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4393"></td>
        <td id="LC4393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">town till nearly daylight, and had then crept through back lanes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4394"></td>
        <td id="LC4394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alleys and finished their sleep in the gallery of the church among a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4395"></td>
        <td id="LC4395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chaos of invalided benches.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4396"></td>
        <td id="LC4396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4397"></td>
        <td id="LC4397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At breakfast, Monday morning, Aunt Polly and Mary were very loving to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4398"></td>
        <td id="LC4398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom, and very attentive to his wants. There was an unusual amount of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4399"></td>
        <td id="LC4399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk. In the course of it Aunt Polly said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4400"></td>
        <td id="LC4400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4401"></td>
        <td id="LC4401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, I don&#39;t say it wasn&#39;t a fine joke, Tom, to keep everybody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4402"></td>
        <td id="LC4402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffering &#39;most a week so you boys had a good time, but it is a pity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4403"></td>
        <td id="LC4403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you could be so hard-hearted as to let me suffer so. If you could come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4404"></td>
        <td id="LC4404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over on a log to go to your funeral, you could have come over and give</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4405"></td>
        <td id="LC4405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me a hint some way that you warn&#39;t dead, but only run off.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4406"></td>
        <td id="LC4406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4407"></td>
        <td id="LC4407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, you could have done that, Tom,&quot; said Mary; &quot;and I believe you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4408"></td>
        <td id="LC4408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would if you had thought of it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4409"></td>
        <td id="LC4409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4410"></td>
        <td id="LC4410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Would you, Tom?&quot; said Aunt Polly, her face lighting wistfully. &quot;Say,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4411"></td>
        <td id="LC4411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now, would you, if you&#39;d thought of it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4412"></td>
        <td id="LC4412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4413"></td>
        <td id="LC4413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I--well, I don&#39;t know. &#39;Twould &#39;a&#39; spoiled everything.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4414"></td>
        <td id="LC4414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4415"></td>
        <td id="LC4415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom, I hoped you loved me that much,&quot; said Aunt Polly, with a grieved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4416"></td>
        <td id="LC4416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tone that discomforted the boy. &quot;It would have been something if you&#39;d</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4417"></td>
        <td id="LC4417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cared enough to THINK of it, even if you didn&#39;t DO it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4418"></td>
        <td id="LC4418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4419"></td>
        <td id="LC4419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, auntie, that ain&#39;t any harm,&quot; pleaded Mary; &quot;it&#39;s only Tom&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4420"></td>
        <td id="LC4420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">giddy way--he is always in such a rush that he never thinks of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4421"></td>
        <td id="LC4421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4422"></td>
        <td id="LC4422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4423"></td>
        <td id="LC4423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;More&#39;s the pity. Sid would have thought. And Sid would have come and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4424"></td>
        <td id="LC4424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DONE it, too. Tom, you&#39;ll look back, some day, when it&#39;s too late, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4425"></td>
        <td id="LC4425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wish you&#39;d cared a little more for me when it would have cost you so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4426"></td>
        <td id="LC4426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4427"></td>
        <td id="LC4427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4428"></td>
        <td id="LC4428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, auntie, you know I do care for you,&quot; said Tom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4429"></td>
        <td id="LC4429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4430"></td>
        <td id="LC4430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;d know it better if you acted more like it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4431"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4432"></td>
        <td id="LC4432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I wish now I&#39;d thought,&quot; said Tom, with a repentant tone; &quot;but I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4433"></td>
        <td id="LC4433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreamt about you, anyway. That&#39;s something, ain&#39;t it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4434"></td>
        <td id="LC4434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4435"></td>
        <td id="LC4435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It ain&#39;t much--a cat does that much--but it&#39;s better than nothing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4436"></td>
        <td id="LC4436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What did you dream?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4437"></td>
        <td id="LC4437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4438"></td>
        <td id="LC4438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, Wednesday night I dreamt that you was sitting over there by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4439"></td>
        <td id="LC4439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed, and Sid was sitting by the woodbox, and Mary next to him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4440"></td>
        <td id="LC4440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4441"></td>
        <td id="LC4441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, so we did. So we always do. I&#39;m glad your dreams could take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4442"></td>
        <td id="LC4442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even that much trouble about us.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4443"></td>
        <td id="LC4443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4444"></td>
        <td id="LC4444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And I dreamt that Joe Harper&#39;s mother was here.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4445"></td>
        <td id="LC4445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4446"></td>
        <td id="LC4446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, she was here! Did you dream any more?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4447"></td>
        <td id="LC4447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4448"></td>
        <td id="LC4448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, lots. But it&#39;s so dim, now.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4449"></td>
        <td id="LC4449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4450"></td>
        <td id="LC4450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, try to recollect--can&#39;t you?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4451"></td>
        <td id="LC4451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4452"></td>
        <td id="LC4452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Somehow it seems to me that the wind--the wind blowed the--the--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4453"></td>
        <td id="LC4453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4454"></td>
        <td id="LC4454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Try harder, Tom! The wind did blow something. Come!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4455"></td>
        <td id="LC4455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The moment he was gone, she ran to a closet and got out the ruin of a</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4915"></td>
        <td id="LC4915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What a curious kind of a fool a girl is! Never been licked in school!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4916"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4917"></td>

        <td id="L5270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5270"></td>
        <td id="LC5270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5271"></td>
        <td id="LC5271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5272"></td>
        <td id="LC5272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM joined the new order of Cadets of Temperance, being attracted by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5273"></td>
        <td id="LC5273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the showy character of their &quot;regalia.&quot; He promised to abstain from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5274"></td>
        <td id="LC5274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smoking, chewing, and profanity as long as he remained a member. Now he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5275"></td>
        <td id="LC5275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found out a new thing--namely, that to promise not to do a thing is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5276"></td>
        <td id="LC5276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surest way in the world to make a body want to go and do that very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5277"></td>
        <td id="LC5277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing. Tom soon found himself tormented with a desire to drink and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5278"></td>
        <td id="LC5278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swear; the desire grew to be so intense that nothing but the hope of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5279"></td>
        <td id="LC5279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chance to display himself in his red sash kept him from withdrawing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5280"></td>
        <td id="LC5280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the order. Fourth of July was coming; but he soon gave that up--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5281"></td>
        <td id="LC5281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave it up before he had worn his shackles over forty-eight hours--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5282"></td>
        <td id="LC5282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fixed his hopes upon old Judge Frazer, justice of the peace, who was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5283"></td>
        <td id="LC5283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apparently on his deathbed and would have a big public funeral, since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5284"></td>
        <td id="LC5284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was so high an official. During three days Tom was deeply concerned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5285"></td>
        <td id="LC5285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about the Judge&#39;s condition and hungry for news of it. Sometimes his</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5378"></td>
        <td id="LC5378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AT last the sleepy atmosphere was stirred--and vigorously: the murder</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="L5473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5473"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5474"></td>
        <td id="LC5474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">don&#39;t--THEY don&#39;t forget him, says I, &#39;and I don&#39;t forget them.&#39; Well,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5475"></td>

        <td id="L5477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5477"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L5558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5558"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5560"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5561"></td>
        <td id="LC5561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">testified itself in tears. Counsel for the defence rose and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5562"></td>
        <td id="LC5562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5563"></td>
        <td id="LC5563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Your honor, in our remarks at the opening of this trial, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5564"></td>
        <td id="LC5564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foreshadowed our purpose to prove that our client did this fearful deed</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5645"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5646"></td>
        <td id="LC5646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM was a glittering hero once more--the pet of the old, the envy of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5647"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5650"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5651"></td>
        <td id="LC5651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As usual, the fickle, unreasoning world took Muff Potter to its bosom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5652"></td>
        <td id="LC5652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fondled him as lavishly as it had abused him before. But that sort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5653"></td>
        <td id="LC5653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of conduct is to the world&#39;s credit; therefore it is not well to find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5654"></td>
        <td id="LC5654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fault with it.</td>

        <td id="L5655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5655"></td>
        <td id="LC5655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5656"></td>
        <td id="LC5656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom&#39;s days were days of splendor and exultation to him, but his nights</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5657"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5658"></td>
        <td id="LC5658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with doom in his eye. Hardly any temptation could persuade the boy to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5659"></td>
        <td id="LC5659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stir abroad after nightfall. Poor Huck was in the same state of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5660"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC6126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6128"></td>
        <td id="LC6128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6129"></td>
        <td id="LC6129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys stretched themselves upon the floor with their eyes to knot-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6130"></td>
        <td id="LC6130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">holes in the planking, and lay waiting, in a misery of fear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6131"></td>
        <td id="LC6131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6132"></td>
        <td id="LC6132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;They&#39;ve stopped.... No--coming.... Here they are. Don&#39;t whisper</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6133"></td>
        <td id="LC6133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another word, Huck. My goodness, I wish I was out of this!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6134"></td>
        <td id="LC6134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6135"></td>
        <td id="LC6135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two men entered. Each boy said to himself: &quot;There&#39;s the old deaf and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6136"></td>
        <td id="LC6136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dumb Spaniard that&#39;s been about town once or twice lately--never saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6137"></td>
        <td id="LC6137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">t&#39;other man before.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6138"></td>
        <td id="LC6138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6139"></td>
        <td id="LC6139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;T&#39;other&quot; was a ragged, unkempt creature, with nothing very pleasant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6140"></td>
        <td id="LC6140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his face. The Spaniard was wrapped in a serape; he had bushy white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6141"></td>
        <td id="LC6141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whiskers; long white hair flowed from under his sombrero, and he wore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6142"></td>
        <td id="LC6142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">green goggles. When they came in, &quot;t&#39;other&quot; was talking in a low voice;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6143"></td>
        <td id="LC6143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they sat down on the ground, facing the door, with their backs to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6144"></td>
        <td id="LC6144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wall, and the speaker continued his remarks. His manner became less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6145"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6146"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6147"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6150"></td>

        <td id="L6151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6151"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6152"></td>
        <td id="LC6152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6153"></td>
        <td id="LC6153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This voice made the boys gasp and quake. It was Injun Joe&#39;s! There was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6154"></td>
        <td id="LC6154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silence for some time. Then Joe said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6155"></td>
        <td id="LC6155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6156"></td>
        <td id="LC6156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What&#39;s any more dangerous than that job up yonder--but nothing&#39;s come</td>

        <td id="L6158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6158"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6159"></td>

        <td id="LC6160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Twon&#39;t ever be known that we tried, anyway, long as we didn&#39;t succeed.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6161"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6165"></td>

        <td id="LC6166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fool of a job. I want to quit this shanty. I wanted to yesterday, only</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6171"></td>
        <td id="LC6171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remark, and thought how lucky it was that they had remembered it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6172"></td>
        <td id="LC6172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Friday and concluded to wait a day. They wished in their hearts they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6173"></td>
        <td id="LC6173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had waited a year.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6174"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6175"></td>
        <td id="LC6175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The two men got out some food and made a luncheon. After a long and</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6177"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L6184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6184"></td>
        <td id="LC6184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was satisfactory. Both men presently fell to yawning, and Injun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6185"></td>
        <td id="LC6185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6186"></td>
        <td id="LC6186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6187"></td>
        <td id="LC6187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;m dead for sleep! It&#39;s your turn to watch.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6188"></td>
        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stirred him once or twice and he became quiet. Presently the watcher</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to nod; his head drooped lower and lower, both men began to snore</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys drew a long, grateful breath. Tom whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now&#39;s our chance--come!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6198"></td>
        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>
        <td id="LC6199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6200"></td>
        <td id="LC6200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I can&#39;t--I&#39;d die if they was to wake.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6201"></td>
        <td id="LC6201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6202"></td>
        <td id="LC6202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom urged--Huck held back. At last Tom rose slowly and softly, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6203"></td>
        <td id="LC6203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started alone. But the first step he made wrung such a hideous creak</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6204"></td>
        <td id="LC6204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the crazy floor that he sank down almost dead with fright. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6205"></td>
        <td id="LC6205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never made a second attempt. The boys lay there counting the dragging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>
        <td id="LC6206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moments till it seemed to them that time must be done and eternity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6207"></td>
        <td id="LC6207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">growing gray; and then they were grateful to note that at last the sun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6208"></td>
        <td id="LC6208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was setting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6209"></td>
        <td id="LC6209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6210"></td>
        <td id="LC6210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now one snore ceased. Injun Joe sat up, stared around--smiled grimly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6211"></td>
        <td id="LC6211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon his comrade, whose head was drooping upon his knees--stirred him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6212"></td>
        <td id="LC6212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up with his foot and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6213"></td>
        <td id="LC6213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6214"></td>
        <td id="LC6214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Here! YOU&#39;RE a watchman, ain&#39;t you! All right, though--nothing&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6215"></td>
        <td id="LC6215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6216"></td>
        <td id="LC6216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6217"></td>
        <td id="LC6217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My! have I been asleep?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6218"></td>
        <td id="LC6218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6219"></td>
        <td id="LC6219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, partly, partly. Nearly time for us to be moving, pard. What&#39;ll we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6220"></td>
        <td id="LC6220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do with what little swag we&#39;ve got left?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6221"></td>
        <td id="LC6221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6222"></td>

        <td id="LC6379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quantity of coin he had seen was too vast to be real. He had never seen</td>

        <td id="L6380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6380"></td>

        <td id="L6385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6385"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC6406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom, if we&#39;d &#39;a&#39; left the blame tools at the dead tree, we&#39;d &#39;a&#39; got</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6408"></td>

        <td id="L6490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6490"></td>
        <td id="LC6490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXVIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6491"></td>
        <td id="LC6491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6492"></td>
        <td id="LC6492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THAT night Tom and Huck were ready for their adventure. They hung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6493"></td>
        <td id="LC6493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about the neighborhood of the tavern until after nine, one watching the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6494"></td>
        <td id="LC6494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alley at a distance and the other the tavern door. Nobody entered the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6495"></td>
        <td id="LC6495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alley or left it; nobody resembling the Spaniard entered or left the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6496"></td>
        <td id="LC6496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tavern door. The night promised to be a fair one; so Tom went home with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6497"></td>
        <td id="LC6497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the understanding that if a considerable degree of darkness came on,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6498"></td>
        <td id="LC6498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck was to come and &quot;maow,&quot; whereupon he would slip out and try the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6499"></td>
        <td id="LC6499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keys. But the night remained clear, and Huck closed his watch and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6500"></td>
        <td id="LC6500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">retired to bed in an empty sugar hogshead about twelve.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6501"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6502"></td>
        <td id="LC6502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tuesday the boys had the same ill luck. Also Wednesday. But Thursday</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6503"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6504"></td>
        <td id="LC6504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old tin lantern, and a large towel to blindfold it with. He hid the</td>

        <td id="L6507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6507"></td>

        <td id="L6508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6508"></td>
        <td id="LC6508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered or left the alley. Everything was auspicious. The blackness of</td>

        <td id="L6514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6514"></td>
        <td id="LC6514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck stood sentry and Tom felt his way into the alley. Then there was a</td>

</td>

        <td id="L6588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6588"></td>

        <td id="L6591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6591"></td>
        <td id="LC6591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6592"></td>
        <td id="LC6592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, I&#39;m agreed. I&#39;ll watch the whole night long, and I&#39;ll do it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6593"></td>
        <td id="LC6593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every night, too, if you&#39;ll do the other part of the job.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6594"></td>
        <td id="LC6594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6595"></td>
        <td id="LC6595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All right, I will. All you got to do is to trot up Hooper Street a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6596"></td>
        <td id="LC6596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">block and maow--and if I&#39;m asleep, you throw some gravel at the window</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6597"></td>
        <td id="LC6597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that&#39;ll fetch me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6598"></td>
        <td id="LC6598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6599"></td>
        <td id="LC6599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Agreed, and good as wheat!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6600"></td>
        <td id="LC6600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6601"></td>
        <td id="LC6601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, Huck, the storm&#39;s over, and I&#39;ll go home. It&#39;ll begin to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6602"></td>
        <td id="LC6602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daylight in a couple of hours. You go back and watch that long, will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6603"></td>
        <td id="LC6603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6604"></td>
        <td id="LC6604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6605"></td>
        <td id="LC6605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I said I would, Tom, and I will. I&#39;ll ha&#39;nt that tavern every night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6606"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6607"></td>
        <td id="LC6607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6608"></td>
        <td id="LC6608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That&#39;s all right. Now, where you going to sleep?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6609"></td>
        <td id="LC6609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6610"></td>
        <td id="LC6610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;In Ben Rogers&#39; hayloft. He lets me, and so does his pap&#39;s nigger man,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6611"></td>
        <td id="LC6611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Uncle Jake. I tote water for Uncle Jake whenever he wants me to, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6612"></td>
        <td id="LC6612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any time I ask him he gives me a little something to eat if he can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6613"></td>
        <td id="LC6613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spare it. That&#39;s a mighty good nigger, Tom. He likes me, becuz I don&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6614"></td>
        <td id="LC6614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever act as if I was above him. Sometime I&#39;ve set right down and eat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6615"></td>
        <td id="LC6615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">WITH him. But you needn&#39;t tell that. A body&#39;s got to do things when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6616"></td>
        <td id="LC6616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he&#39;s awful hungry he wouldn&#39;t want to do as a steady thing.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6617"></td>
        <td id="LC6617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6618"></td>
        <td id="LC6618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, if I don&#39;t want you in the daytime, I&#39;ll let you sleep. I won&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6619"></td>
        <td id="LC6619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come bothering around. Any time you see something&#39;s up, in the night,</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6622"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6623"></td>
        <td id="LC6623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXIX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6624"></td>
        <td id="LC6624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6625"></td>
        <td id="LC6625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE first thing Tom heard on Friday morning was a glad piece of news--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6626"></td>
        <td id="LC6626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Judge Thatcher&#39;s family had come back to town the night before. Both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6627"></td>
        <td id="LC6627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Injun Joe and the treasure sunk into secondary importance for a moment,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6628"></td>
        <td id="LC6628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Becky took the chief place in the boy&#39;s interest. He saw her and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6629"></td>
        <td id="LC6629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had an exhausting good time playing &quot;hi-spy&quot; and &quot;gully-keeper&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6630"></td>
        <td id="LC6630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a crowd of their school-mates. The day was completed and crowned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6631"></td>
        <td id="LC6631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a peculiarly satisfactory way: Becky teased her mother to appoint</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6632"></td>
        <td id="LC6632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the next day for the long-promised and long-delayed picnic, and she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6633"></td>
        <td id="LC6633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consented. The child&#39;s delight was boundless; and Tom&#39;s not more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6634"></td>
        <td id="LC6634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moderate. The invitations were sent out before sunset, and straightway</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6635"></td>
        <td id="LC6635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the young folks of the village were thrown into a fever of preparation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6636"></td>
        <td id="LC6636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and pleasurable anticipation. Tom&#39;s excitement enabled him to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6637"></td>
        <td id="LC6637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awake until a pretty late hour, and he had good hopes of hearing Huck&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6638"></td>
        <td id="LC6638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;maow,&quot; and of having his treasure to astonish Becky and the picnickers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6639"></td>
        <td id="LC6639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with, next day; but he was disappointed. No signal came that night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6640"></td>
        <td id="LC6640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6641"></td>
        <td id="LC6641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Morning came, eventually, and by ten or eleven o&#39;clock a giddy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6642"></td>
        <td id="LC6642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rollicking company were gathered at Judge Thatcher&#39;s, and everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6643"></td>
        <td id="LC6643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was ready for a start. It was not the custom for elderly people to mar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6644"></td>
        <td id="LC6644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the picnics with their presence. The children were considered safe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6645"></td>
        <td id="LC6645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough under the wings of a few young ladies of eighteen and a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6646"></td>
        <td id="LC6646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young gentlemen of twenty-three or thereabouts. The old steam ferryboat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6647"></td>
        <td id="LC6647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was chartered for the occasion; presently the gay throng filed up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6648"></td>
        <td id="LC6648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">main street laden with provision-baskets. Sid was sick and had to miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6649"></td>
        <td id="LC6649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the fun; Mary remained at home to entertain him. The last thing Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6650"></td>
        <td id="LC6650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thatcher said to Becky, was:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6651"></td>
        <td id="LC6651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6652"></td>
        <td id="LC6652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You&#39;ll not get back till late. Perhaps you&#39;d better stay all night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6653"></td>
        <td id="LC6653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with some of the girls that live near the ferry-landing, child.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6654"></td>
        <td id="LC6654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6655"></td>
        <td id="LC6655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then I&#39;ll stay with Susy Harper, mamma.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6656"></td>
        <td id="LC6656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6657"></td>
        <td id="LC6657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Very well. And mind and behave yourself and don&#39;t be any trouble.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6658"></td>
        <td id="LC6658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6659"></td>
        <td id="LC6659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently, as they tripped along, Tom said to Becky:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6660"></td>
        <td id="LC6660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6661"></td>
        <td id="LC6661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Say--I&#39;ll tell you what we&#39;ll do. &#39;Stead of going to Joe Harper&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6662"></td>
        <td id="LC6662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we&#39;ll climb right up the hill and stop at the Widow Douglas&#39;. She&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6663"></td>
        <td id="LC6663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have ice-cream! She has it most every day--dead loads of it. And she&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6664"></td>
        <td id="LC6664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be awful glad to have us.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6665"></td>
        <td id="LC6665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6666"></td>
        <td id="LC6666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, that will be fun!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6667"></td>
        <td id="LC6667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6668"></td>
        <td id="LC6668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Becky reflected a moment and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6669"></td>
        <td id="LC6669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6670"></td>
        <td id="LC6670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But what will mamma say?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6671"></td>
        <td id="LC6671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6672"></td>
        <td id="LC6672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How&#39;ll she ever know?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6673"></td>
        <td id="LC6673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6674"></td>
        <td id="LC6674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The girl turned the idea over in her mind, and said reluctantly:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6675"></td>
        <td id="LC6675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6676"></td>
        <td id="LC6676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I reckon it&#39;s wrong--but--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6677"></td>
        <td id="LC6677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6678"></td>
        <td id="LC6678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But shucks! Your mother won&#39;t know, and so what&#39;s the harm? All she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6679"></td>
        <td id="LC6679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wants is that you&#39;ll be safe; and I bet you she&#39;d &#39;a&#39; said go there if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6680"></td>
        <td id="LC6680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she&#39;d &#39;a&#39; thought of it. I know she would!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6681"></td>
        <td id="LC6681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6682"></td>
        <td id="LC6682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Widow Douglas&#39; splendid hospitality was a tempting bait. It and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6683"></td>

        <td id="L6864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6864"></td>
        <td id="LC6864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6865"></td>
        <td id="LC6865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What&#39;s the row there? Who&#39;s banging? What do you want?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6866"></td>
        <td id="LC6866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6867"></td>
        <td id="LC6867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let me in--quick! I&#39;ll tell everything.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6868"></td>
        <td id="LC6868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6869"></td>
        <td id="LC6869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, who are you?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6870"></td>
        <td id="LC6870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6871"></td>
        <td id="LC6871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Huckleberry Finn--quick, let me in!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6872"></td>
        <td id="LC6872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6873"></td>
        <td id="LC6873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Huckleberry Finn, indeed! It ain&#39;t a name to open many doors, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6874"></td>
        <td id="LC6874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judge! But let him in, lads, and let&#39;s see what&#39;s the trouble.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6875"></td>
        <td id="LC6875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6876"></td>
        <td id="LC6876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Please don&#39;t ever tell I told you,&quot; were Huck&#39;s first words when he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6877"></td>
        <td id="LC6877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got in. &quot;Please don&#39;t--I&#39;d be killed, sure--but the widow&#39;s been good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6878"></td>
        <td id="LC6878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends to me sometimes, and I want to tell--I WILL tell if you&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6879"></td>
        <td id="LC6879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promise you won&#39;t ever say it was me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6880"></td>
        <td id="LC6880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6881"></td>
        <td id="LC6881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;By George, he HAS got something to tell, or he wouldn&#39;t act so!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6882"></td>
        <td id="LC6882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exclaimed the old man; &quot;out with it and nobody here&#39;ll ever tell, lad.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6883"></td>
        <td id="LC6883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6884"></td>
        <td id="LC6884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three minutes later the old man and his sons, well armed, were up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6885"></td>
        <td id="LC6885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hill, and just entering the sumach path on tiptoe, their weapons in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6886"></td>
        <td id="LC6886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their hands. Huck accompanied them no further. He hid behind a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6887"></td>
        <td id="LC6887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bowlder and fell to listening. There was a lagging, anxious silence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6888"></td>
        <td id="LC6888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then all of a sudden there was an explosion of firearms and a cry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6889"></td>
        <td id="LC6889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6890"></td>
        <td id="LC6890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck waited for no particulars. He sprang away and sped down the hill</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6891"></td>
        <td id="LC6891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as fast as his legs could carry him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6892"></td>

</td>

</td>
