        <td id="L6894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6894"></td>
        <td id="LC6894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6895"></td>
        <td id="LC6895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6896"></td>
        <td id="LC6896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AS the earliest suspicion of dawn appeared on Sunday morning, Huck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6897"></td>
        <td id="LC6897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came groping up the hill and rapped gently at the old Welshman&#39;s door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6898"></td>
        <td id="LC6898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The inmates were asleep, but it was a sleep that was set on a hair-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6899"></td>
        <td id="LC6899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trigger, on account of the exciting episode of the night. A call came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6900"></td>
        <td id="LC6900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from a window:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6901"></td>
        <td id="LC6901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6902"></td>
        <td id="LC6902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Who&#39;s there!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6903"></td>
        <td id="LC6903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6904"></td>
        <td id="LC6904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck&#39;s scared voice answered in a low tone:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6905"></td>
        <td id="LC6905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6906"></td>
        <td id="LC6906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Please let me in! It&#39;s only Huck Finn!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6907"></td>
        <td id="LC6907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6908"></td>
        <td id="LC6908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s a name that can open this door night or day, lad!--and welcome!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6909"></td>
        <td id="LC6909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6910"></td>
        <td id="LC6910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These were strange words to the vagabond boy&#39;s ears, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6911"></td>
        <td id="LC6911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasantest he had ever heard. He could not recollect that the closing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6912"></td>
        <td id="LC6912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word had ever been applied in his case before. The door was quickly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6913"></td>
        <td id="LC6913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unlocked, and he entered. Huck was given a seat and the old man and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6914"></td>
        <td id="LC6914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brace of tall sons speedily dressed themselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6915"></td>
        <td id="LC6915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6916"></td>
        <td id="LC6916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, my boy, I hope you&#39;re good and hungry, because breakfast will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6917"></td>
        <td id="LC6917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready as soon as the sun&#39;s up, and we&#39;ll have a piping hot one, too--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6918"></td>
        <td id="LC6918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make yourself easy about that! I and the boys hoped you&#39;d turn up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6919"></td>
        <td id="LC6919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stop here last night.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6920"></td>
        <td id="LC6920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6921"></td>
        <td id="LC6921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I was awful scared,&quot; said Huck, &quot;and I run. I took out when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6922"></td>
        <td id="LC6922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pistols went off, and I didn&#39;t stop for three mile. I&#39;ve come now becuz</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6923"></td>
        <td id="LC6923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I wanted to know about it, you know; and I come before daylight becuz I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6924"></td>
        <td id="LC6924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">didn&#39;t want to run across them devils, even if they was dead.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6925"></td>
        <td id="LC6925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6926"></td>
        <td id="LC6926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, poor chap, you do look as if you&#39;d had a hard night of it--but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6927"></td>
        <td id="LC6927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there&#39;s a bed here for you when you&#39;ve had your breakfast. No, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6928"></td>
        <td id="LC6928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ain&#39;t dead, lad--we are sorry enough for that. You see we knew right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6929"></td>
        <td id="LC6929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where to put our hands on them, by your description; so we crept along</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6930"></td>
        <td id="LC6930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on tiptoe till we got within fifteen feet of them--dark as a cellar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6931"></td>
        <td id="LC6931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that sumach path was--and just then I found I was going to sneeze. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6932"></td>
        <td id="LC6932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the meanest kind of luck! I tried to keep it back, but no use--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6933"></td>
        <td id="LC6933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;twas bound to come, and it did come! I was in the lead with my pistol</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6934"></td>
        <td id="LC6934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raised, and when the sneeze started those scoundrels a-rustling to get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6935"></td>
        <td id="LC6935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the path, I sung out, &#39;Fire boys!&#39; and blazed away at the place</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6936"></td>
        <td id="LC6936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where the rustling was. So did the boys. But they were off in a jiffy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6937"></td>
        <td id="LC6937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those villains, and we after them, down through the woods. I judge we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6938"></td>
        <td id="LC6938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never touched them. They fired a shot apiece as they started, but their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6939"></td>
        <td id="LC6939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bullets whizzed by and didn&#39;t do us any harm. As soon as we lost the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6940"></td>
        <td id="LC6940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sound of their feet we quit chasing, and went down and stirred up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6941"></td>
        <td id="LC6941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constables. They got a posse together, and went off to guard the river</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6942"></td>
        <td id="LC6942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bank, and as soon as it is light the sheriff and a gang are going to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6943"></td>
        <td id="LC6943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beat up the woods. My boys will be with them presently. I wish we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6944"></td>
        <td id="LC6944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some sort of description of those rascals--&#39;twould help a good deal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6945"></td>
        <td id="LC6945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But you couldn&#39;t see what they were like, in the dark, lad, I suppose?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6946"></td>
        <td id="LC6946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6947"></td>
        <td id="LC6947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh yes; I saw them down-town and follered them.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6948"></td>
        <td id="LC6948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6949"></td>
        <td id="LC6949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Splendid! Describe them--describe them, my boy!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6950"></td>
        <td id="LC6950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6951"></td>
        <td id="LC6951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;One&#39;s the old deaf and dumb Spaniard that&#39;s ben around here once or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6952"></td>
        <td id="LC6952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twice, and t&#39;other&#39;s a mean-looking, ragged--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6953"></td>
        <td id="LC6953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6954"></td>
        <td id="LC6954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That&#39;s enough, lad, we know the men! Happened on them in the woods</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6955"></td>
        <td id="LC6955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back of the widow&#39;s one day, and they slunk away. Off with you, boys,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6956"></td>
        <td id="LC6956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tell the sheriff--get your breakfast to-morrow morning!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6957"></td>
        <td id="LC6957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6958"></td>
        <td id="LC6958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Welshman&#39;s sons departed at once. As they were leaving the room</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6959"></td>
        <td id="LC6959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck sprang up and exclaimed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6960"></td>
        <td id="LC6960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6961"></td>
        <td id="LC6961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, please don&#39;t tell ANYbody it was me that blowed on them! Oh,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6962"></td>
        <td id="LC6962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">please!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6963"></td>
        <td id="LC6963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6964"></td>
        <td id="LC6964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All right if you say it, Huck, but you ought to have the credit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6965"></td>
        <td id="LC6965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what you did.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6966"></td>
        <td id="LC6966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6967"></td>
        <td id="LC6967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh no, no! Please don&#39;t tell!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6968"></td>
        <td id="LC6968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6969"></td>
        <td id="LC6969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the young men were gone, the old Welshman said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6970"></td>
        <td id="LC6970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6971"></td>
        <td id="LC6971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;They won&#39;t tell--and I won&#39;t. But why don&#39;t you want it known?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6972"></td>
        <td id="LC6972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6973"></td>
        <td id="LC6973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck would not explain, further than to say that he already knew too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6974"></td>
        <td id="LC6974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much about one of those men and would not have the man know that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6975"></td>
        <td id="LC6975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew anything against him for the whole world--he would be killed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6976"></td>
        <td id="LC6976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowing it, sure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6977"></td>
        <td id="LC6977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6978"></td>
        <td id="LC6978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The old man promised secrecy once more, and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6979"></td>
        <td id="LC6979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6980"></td>
        <td id="LC6980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How did you come to follow these fellows, lad? Were they looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6981"></td>
        <td id="LC6981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspicious?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6982"></td>
        <td id="LC6982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6983"></td>
        <td id="LC6983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck was silent while he framed a duly cautious reply. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6984"></td>
        <td id="LC6984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6985"></td>
        <td id="LC6985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, you see, I&#39;m a kind of a hard lot,--least everybody says so,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6986"></td>
        <td id="LC6986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I don&#39;t see nothing agin it--and sometimes I can&#39;t sleep much, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6987"></td>
        <td id="LC6987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account of thinking about it and sort of trying to strike out a new way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6988"></td>
        <td id="LC6988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of doing. That was the way of it last night. I couldn&#39;t sleep, and so I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6989"></td>
        <td id="LC6989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come along up-street &#39;bout midnight, a-turning it all over, and when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6990"></td>
        <td id="LC6990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got to that old shackly brick store by the Temperance Tavern, I backed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6991"></td>
        <td id="LC6991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up agin the wall to have another think. Well, just then along comes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6992"></td>
        <td id="LC6992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these two chaps slipping along close by me, with something under their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6993"></td>
        <td id="LC6993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arm, and I reckoned they&#39;d stole it. One was a-smoking, and t&#39;other one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6994"></td>
        <td id="LC6994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted a light; so they stopped right before me and the cigars lit up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6995"></td>
        <td id="LC6995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their faces and I see that the big one was the deaf and dumb Spaniard,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6996"></td>
        <td id="LC6996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by his white whiskers and the patch on his eye, and t&#39;other one was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6997"></td>
        <td id="LC6997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rusty, ragged-looking devil.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6998"></td>
        <td id="LC6998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6999"></td>
        <td id="LC6999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Could you see the rags by the light of the cigars?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7000"></td>
        <td id="LC7000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7001"></td>
        <td id="LC7001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This staggered Huck for a moment. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7002"></td>
        <td id="LC7002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7003"></td>
        <td id="LC7003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, I don&#39;t know--but somehow it seems as if I did.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7004"></td>
        <td id="LC7004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7005"></td>
        <td id="LC7005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then they went on, and you--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7006"></td>
        <td id="LC7006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7007"></td>
        <td id="LC7007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Follered &#39;em--yes. That was it. I wanted to see what was up--they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7008"></td>
        <td id="LC7008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sneaked along so. I dogged &#39;em to the widder&#39;s stile, and stood in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7009"></td>
        <td id="LC7009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark and heard the ragged one beg for the widder, and the Spaniard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7010"></td>
        <td id="LC7010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swear he&#39;d spile her looks just as I told you and your two--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7011"></td>
        <td id="LC7011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7012"></td>
        <td id="LC7012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What! The DEAF AND DUMB man said all that!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7013"></td>
        <td id="LC7013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7014"></td>
        <td id="LC7014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck had made another terrible mistake! He was trying his best to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7015"></td>
        <td id="LC7015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the old man from getting the faintest hint of who the Spaniard might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7016"></td>
        <td id="LC7016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be, and yet his tongue seemed determined to get him into trouble in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7017"></td>
        <td id="LC7017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spite of all he could do. He made several efforts to creep out of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7018"></td>
        <td id="LC7018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scrape, but the old man&#39;s eye was upon him and he made blunder after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7019"></td>
        <td id="LC7019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blunder. Presently the Welshman said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7020"></td>
        <td id="LC7020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7021"></td>
        <td id="LC7021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My boy, don&#39;t be afraid of me. I wouldn&#39;t hurt a hair of your head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7022"></td>
        <td id="LC7022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for all the world. No--I&#39;d protect you--I&#39;d protect you. This Spaniard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7023"></td>
        <td id="LC7023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is not deaf and dumb; you&#39;ve let that slip without intending it; you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7024"></td>
        <td id="LC7024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can&#39;t cover that up now. You know something about that Spaniard that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7025"></td>
        <td id="LC7025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you want to keep dark. Now trust me--tell me what it is, and trust me--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7026"></td>
        <td id="LC7026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I won&#39;t betray you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7027"></td>
        <td id="LC7027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7028"></td>
        <td id="LC7028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck looked into the old man&#39;s honest eyes a moment, then bent over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7029"></td>
        <td id="LC7029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and whispered in his ear:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7030"></td>
        <td id="LC7030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7031"></td>
        <td id="LC7031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;&#39;Tain&#39;t a Spaniard--it&#39;s Injun Joe!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7032"></td>
        <td id="LC7032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7033"></td>
        <td id="LC7033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Welshman almost jumped out of his chair. In a moment he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7034"></td>
        <td id="LC7034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7035"></td>
        <td id="LC7035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s all plain enough, now. When you talked about notching ears and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7036"></td>
        <td id="LC7036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slitting noses I judged that that was your own embellishment, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7037"></td>
        <td id="LC7037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white men don&#39;t take that sort of revenge. But an Injun! That&#39;s a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7038"></td>
        <td id="LC7038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different matter altogether.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7039"></td>
        <td id="LC7039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7040"></td>
        <td id="LC7040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">During breakfast the talk went on, and in the course of it the old man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7041"></td>
        <td id="LC7041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said that the last thing which he and his sons had done, before going</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7042"></td>
        <td id="LC7042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to bed, was to get a lantern and examine the stile and its vicinity for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7043"></td>
        <td id="LC7043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marks of blood. They found none, but captured a bulky bundle of--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7044"></td>
        <td id="LC7044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7045"></td>
        <td id="LC7045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Of WHAT?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7046"></td>
        <td id="LC7046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7047"></td>
        <td id="LC7047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If the words had been lightning they could not have leaped with a more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7048"></td>

</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7325"></td>
        <td id="LC7325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way, glancing at each new opening, to see if there was anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7326"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7327"></td>

        <td id="L7328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7328"></td>
        <td id="LC7328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sign, and he would say cheerily:</td>

        <td id="L7329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7329"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L7332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7332"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7333"></td>
        <td id="LC7333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But he felt less and less hopeful with each failure, and presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7334"></td>
        <td id="LC7334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to turn off into diverging avenues at sheer random, in desperate</td>

        <td id="L7337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7337"></td>

        <td id="LC7338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Becky clung to his side in an anguish of fear, and tried hard to keep</td>

        <td id="L7340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7340"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7346"></td>
        <td id="LC7346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Profound silence; silence so deep that even their breathings were</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7347"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7389"></td>

      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7394"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7400"></td>

        <td id="L7407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7407"></td>

        <td id="L7409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7409"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7413"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7414"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7416"></td>
        <td id="LC7416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7417"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7426"></td>
        <td id="LC7426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to estimate how long they had been in the cave, but all they knew was</td>

        <td id="LC7509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they must have been missed long ago, and no doubt the search was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7510"></td>
        <td id="LC7510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going on. He would shout and maybe some one would come. He tried it;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7511"></td>
        <td id="LC7511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but in the darkness the distant echoes sounded so hideously that he</td>

        <td id="LC7515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A portion of Tom&#39;s half of the cake was left; they divided and ate it.</td>

        <td id="L7592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7592"></td>
        <td id="LC7592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TUESDAY afternoon came, and waned to the twilight. The village of St.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7593"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7598"></td>
        <td id="LC7598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the children could never be found. Mrs. Thatcher was very ill, and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7599"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7600"></td>
        <td id="LC7600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hear her call her child, and raise her head and listen a whole minute</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7603"></td>

        <td id="LC7695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7696"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7697"></td>
        <td id="LC7697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXXIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7698"></td>
        <td id="LC7698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7699"></td>
        <td id="LC7699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">WITHIN a few minutes the news had spread, and a dozen skiff-loads of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7700"></td>
        <td id="LC7700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men were on their way to McDougal&#39;s cave, and the ferryboat, well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7701"></td>
        <td id="LC7701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">filled with passengers, soon followed. Tom Sawyer was in the skiff that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7702"></td>
        <td id="LC7702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bore Judge Thatcher.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7703"></td>
        <td id="LC7703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7704"></td>
        <td id="LC7704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the cave door was unlocked, a sorrowful sight presented itself in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7705"></td>
        <td id="LC7705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dim twilight of the place. Injun Joe lay stretched upon the ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7706"></td>
        <td id="LC7706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead, with his face close to the crack of the door, as if his longing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7707"></td>
        <td id="LC7707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes had been fixed, to the latest moment, upon the light and the cheer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7708"></td>
        <td id="LC7708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the free world outside. Tom was touched, for he knew by his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7709"></td>
        <td id="LC7709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience how this wretch had suffered. His pity was moved, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7710"></td>
        <td id="LC7710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nevertheless he felt an abounding sense of relief and security, now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7711"></td>
        <td id="LC7711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which revealed to him in a degree which he had not fully appreciated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7712"></td>
        <td id="LC7712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before how vast a weight of dread had been lying upon him since the day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7713"></td>
        <td id="LC7713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he lifted his voice against this bloody-minded outcast.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7714"></td>
        <td id="LC7714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7715"></td>
        <td id="LC7715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Injun Joe&#39;s bowie-knife lay close by, its blade broken in two. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7716"></td>
        <td id="LC7716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great foundation-beam of the door had been chipped and hacked through,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7717"></td>
        <td id="LC7717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with tedious labor; useless labor, too, it was, for the native rock</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7718"></td>
        <td id="LC7718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">formed a sill outside it, and upon that stubborn material the knife had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7719"></td>
        <td id="LC7719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrought no effect; the only damage done was to the knife itself. But if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7720"></td>
        <td id="LC7720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there had been no stony obstruction there the labor would have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7721"></td>
        <td id="LC7721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useless still, for if the beam had been wholly cut away Injun Joe could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7722"></td>
        <td id="LC7722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not have squeezed his body under the door, and he knew it. So he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7723"></td>
        <td id="LC7723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only hacked that place in order to be doing something--in order to pass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7724"></td>
        <td id="LC7724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the weary time--in order to employ his tortured faculties. Ordinarily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7725"></td>
        <td id="LC7725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one could find half a dozen bits of candle stuck around in the crevices</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7726"></td>
        <td id="LC7726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of this vestibule, left there by tourists; but there were none now. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7727"></td>
        <td id="LC7727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prisoner had searched them out and eaten them. He had also contrived to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7728"></td>
        <td id="LC7728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">catch a few bats, and these, also, he had eaten, leaving only their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7729"></td>
        <td id="LC7729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">claws. The poor unfortunate had starved to death. In one place, near at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7730"></td>
        <td id="LC7730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand, a stalagmite had been slowly growing up from the ground for ages,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7731"></td>
        <td id="LC7731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">builded by the water-drip from a stalactite overhead. The captive had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7732"></td>
        <td id="LC7732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broken off the stalagmite, and upon the stump had placed a stone,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7733"></td>
        <td id="LC7733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherein he had scooped a shallow hollow to catch the precious drop that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7734"></td>
        <td id="LC7734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell once in every three minutes with the dreary regularity of a clock-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7735"></td>
        <td id="LC7735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tick--a dessertspoonful once in four and twenty hours. That drop was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7736"></td>
        <td id="LC7736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falling when the Pyramids were new; when Troy fell; when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7737"></td>
        <td id="LC7737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foundations of Rome were laid when Christ was crucified; when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7738"></td>
        <td id="LC7738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Conqueror created the British empire; when Columbus sailed; when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7739"></td>
        <td id="LC7739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">massacre at Lexington was &quot;news.&quot; It is falling now; it will still be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7740"></td>
        <td id="LC7740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falling when all these things shall have sunk down the afternoon of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7741"></td>
        <td id="LC7741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">history, and the twilight of tradition, and been swallowed up in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7742"></td>
        <td id="LC7742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thick night of oblivion. Has everything a purpose and a mission? Did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7743"></td>
        <td id="LC7743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this drop fall patiently during five thousand years to be ready for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7744"></td>
        <td id="LC7744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this flitting human insect&#39;s need? and has it another important object</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7745"></td>
        <td id="LC7745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to accomplish ten thousand years to come? No matter. It is many and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7746"></td>
        <td id="LC7746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many a year since the hapless half-breed scooped out the stone to catch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7747"></td>
        <td id="LC7747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the priceless drops, but to this day the tourist stares longest at that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7748"></td>
        <td id="LC7748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pathetic stone and that slow-dropping water when he comes to see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7749"></td>
        <td id="LC7749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonders of McDougal&#39;s cave. Injun Joe&#39;s cup stands first in the list of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7750"></td>
        <td id="LC7750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the cavern&#39;s marvels; even &quot;Aladdin&#39;s Palace&quot; cannot rival it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7751"></td>
        <td id="LC7751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7752"></td>
        <td id="LC7752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Injun Joe was buried near the mouth of the cave; and people flocked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7753"></td>
        <td id="LC7753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there in boats and wagons from the towns and from all the farms and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7754"></td>
        <td id="LC7754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hamlets for seven miles around; they brought their children, and all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7755"></td>
        <td id="LC7755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorts of provisions, and confessed that they had had almost as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7756"></td>
        <td id="LC7756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfactory a time at the funeral as they could have had at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7757"></td>
        <td id="LC7757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hanging.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7758"></td>
        <td id="LC7758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7759"></td>
        <td id="LC7759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This funeral stopped the further growth of one thing--the petition to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7760"></td>
        <td id="LC7760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the governor for Injun Joe&#39;s pardon. The petition had been largely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7761"></td>
        <td id="LC7761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">signed; many tearful and eloquent meetings had been held, and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7762"></td>
        <td id="LC7762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">committee of sappy women been appointed to go in deep mourning and wail</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7763"></td>
        <td id="LC7763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around the governor, and implore him to be a merciful ass and trample</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7764"></td>
        <td id="LC7764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his duty under foot. Injun Joe was believed to have killed five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7765"></td>
        <td id="LC7765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizens of the village, but what of that? If he had been Satan himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7766"></td>
        <td id="LC7766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there would have been plenty of weaklings ready to scribble their names</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7767"></td>
        <td id="LC7767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to a pardon-petition, and drip a tear on it from their permanently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7768"></td>
        <td id="LC7768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impaired and leaky water-works.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7769"></td>
        <td id="LC7769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7770"></td>
        <td id="LC7770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The morning after the funeral Tom took Huck to a private place to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7771"></td>
        <td id="LC7771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an important talk. Huck had learned all about Tom&#39;s adventure from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7772"></td>
        <td id="LC7772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Welshman and the Widow Douglas, by this time, but Tom said he reckoned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7773"></td>
        <td id="LC7773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was one thing they had not told him; that thing was what he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7774"></td>
        <td id="LC7774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted to talk about now. Huck&#39;s face saddened. He said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7775"></td>
        <td id="LC7775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7776"></td>
        <td id="LC7776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I know what it is. You got into No. 2 and never found anything but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7777"></td>
        <td id="LC7777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whiskey. Nobody told me it was you; but I just knowed it must &#39;a&#39; ben</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7778"></td>
        <td id="LC7778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, soon as I heard &#39;bout that whiskey business; and I knowed you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7779"></td>
        <td id="LC7779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hadn&#39;t got the money becuz you&#39;d &#39;a&#39; got at me some way or other and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7780"></td>
        <td id="LC7780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told me even if you was mum to everybody else. Tom, something&#39;s always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7781"></td>
        <td id="LC7781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told me we&#39;d never get holt of that swag.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7782"></td>
        <td id="LC7782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7783"></td>
        <td id="LC7783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, Huck, I never told on that tavern-keeper. YOU know his tavern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7784"></td>
        <td id="LC7784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was all right the Saturday I went to the picnic. Don&#39;t you remember you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7785"></td>
        <td id="LC7785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was to watch there that night?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
