      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7879"></td>
        <td id="LC7879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7880"></td>
        <td id="LC7880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, most anybody. Waylay people--that&#39;s mostly the way.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7881"></td>
        <td id="LC7881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7882"></td>
        <td id="LC7882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And kill them?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7883"></td>
        <td id="LC7883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7884"></td>
        <td id="LC7884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, not always. Hive them in the cave till they raise a ransom.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7885"></td>
        <td id="LC7885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7886"></td>
        <td id="LC7886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What&#39;s a ransom?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7887"></td>
        <td id="LC7887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7888"></td>
        <td id="LC7888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Money. You make them raise all they can, off&#39;n their friends; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7889"></td>
        <td id="LC7889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after you&#39;ve kept them a year, if it ain&#39;t raised then you kill them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7890"></td>
        <td id="LC7890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That&#39;s the general way. Only you don&#39;t kill the women. You shut up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7891"></td>
        <td id="LC7891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">women, but you don&#39;t kill them. They&#39;re always beautiful and rich, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7892"></td>
        <td id="LC7892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awfully scared. You take their watches and things, but you always take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7893"></td>
        <td id="LC7893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your hat off and talk polite. They ain&#39;t anybody as polite as robbers--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7894"></td>
        <td id="LC7894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you&#39;ll see that in any book. Well, the women get to loving you, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7895"></td>
        <td id="LC7895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after they&#39;ve been in the cave a week or two weeks they stop crying and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7896"></td>
        <td id="LC7896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after that you couldn&#39;t get them to leave. If you drove them out they&#39;d</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7897"></td>
        <td id="LC7897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn right around and come back. It&#39;s so in all the books.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7898"></td>
        <td id="LC7898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7899"></td>
        <td id="LC7899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, it&#39;s real bully, Tom. I believe it&#39;s better&#39;n to be a pirate.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7900"></td>
        <td id="LC7900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7901"></td>
        <td id="LC7901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, it&#39;s better in some ways, because it&#39;s close to home and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7902"></td>
        <td id="LC7902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circuses and all that.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7903"></td>
        <td id="LC7903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7904"></td>
        <td id="LC7904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By this time everything was ready and the boys entered the hole, Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7905"></td>
        <td id="LC7905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the lead. They toiled their way to the farther end of the tunnel,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7906"></td>
        <td id="LC7906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then made their spliced kite-strings fast and moved on. A few steps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7907"></td>
        <td id="LC7907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought them to the spring, and Tom felt a shudder quiver all through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7908"></td>
        <td id="LC7908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. He showed Huck the fragment of candle-wick perched on a lump of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7909"></td>
        <td id="LC7909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clay against the wall, and described how he and Becky had watched the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7910"></td>
        <td id="LC7910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flame struggle and expire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7911"></td>
        <td id="LC7911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7912"></td>
        <td id="LC7912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys began to quiet down to whispers, now, for the stillness and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7913"></td>
        <td id="LC7913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom of the place oppressed their spirits. They went on, and presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7914"></td>
        <td id="LC7914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered and followed Tom&#39;s other corridor until they reached the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7915"></td>
        <td id="LC7915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;jumping-off place.&quot; The candles revealed the fact that it was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7916"></td>
        <td id="LC7916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">really a precipice, but only a steep clay hill twenty or thirty feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7917"></td>
        <td id="LC7917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high. Tom whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7918"></td>
        <td id="LC7918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7919"></td>
        <td id="LC7919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now I&#39;ll show you something, Huck.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7920"></td>
        <td id="LC7920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7921"></td>
        <td id="LC7921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He held his candle aloft and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7922"></td>
        <td id="LC7922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7923"></td>
        <td id="LC7923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Look as far around the corner as you can. Do you see that? There--on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7924"></td>
        <td id="LC7924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the big rock over yonder--done with candle-smoke.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7925"></td>
        <td id="LC7925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7926"></td>
        <td id="LC7926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom, it&#39;s a CROSS!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7927"></td>
        <td id="LC7927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7928"></td>
        <td id="LC7928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;NOW where&#39;s your Number Two? &#39;UNDER THE CROSS,&#39; hey? Right yonder&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7929"></td>
        <td id="LC7929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where I saw Injun Joe poke up his candle, Huck!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7930"></td>
        <td id="LC7930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7931"></td>
        <td id="LC7931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck stared at the mystic sign awhile, and then said with a shaky voice:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7932"></td>
        <td id="LC7932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7933"></td>
        <td id="LC7933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom, less git out of here!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7934"></td>
        <td id="LC7934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7935"></td>
        <td id="LC7935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What! and leave the treasure?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7936"></td>
        <td id="LC7936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7937"></td>
        <td id="LC7937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes--leave it. Injun Joe&#39;s ghost is round about there, certain.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7938"></td>
        <td id="LC7938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7939"></td>
        <td id="LC7939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No it ain&#39;t, Huck, no it ain&#39;t. It would ha&#39;nt the place where he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7940"></td>
        <td id="LC7940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">died--away out at the mouth of the cave--five mile from here.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7941"></td>
        <td id="LC7941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7942"></td>
        <td id="LC7942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, Tom, it wouldn&#39;t. It would hang round the money. I know the ways</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7943"></td>
        <td id="LC7943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of ghosts, and so do you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7944"></td>
        <td id="LC7944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7945"></td>
        <td id="LC7945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom began to fear that Huck was right. Misgivings gathered in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7946"></td>
        <td id="LC7946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind. But presently an idea occurred to him--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7947"></td>
        <td id="LC7947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7948"></td>
        <td id="LC7948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lookyhere, Huck, what fools we&#39;re making of ourselves! Injun Joe&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7949"></td>
        <td id="LC7949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ghost ain&#39;t a going to come around where there&#39;s a cross!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7950"></td>
        <td id="LC7950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7951"></td>
        <td id="LC7951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The point was well taken. It had its effect.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7952"></td>
        <td id="LC7952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7953"></td>
        <td id="LC7953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom, I didn&#39;t think of that. But that&#39;s so. It&#39;s luck for us, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7954"></td>
        <td id="LC7954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cross is. I reckon we&#39;ll climb down there and have a hunt for that box.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7955"></td>
        <td id="LC7955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7956"></td>
        <td id="LC7956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom went first, cutting rude steps in the clay hill as he descended.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7957"></td>
        <td id="LC7957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck followed. Four avenues opened out of the small cavern which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7958"></td>
        <td id="LC7958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great rock stood in. The boys examined three of them with no result.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7959"></td>
        <td id="LC7959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They found a small recess in the one nearest the base of the rock, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7960"></td>
        <td id="LC7960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a pallet of blankets spread down in it; also an old suspender, some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7961"></td>
        <td id="LC7961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bacon rind, and the well-gnawed bones of two or three fowls. But there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7962"></td>
        <td id="LC7962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was no money-box. The lads searched and researched this place, but in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7963"></td>
        <td id="LC7963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vain. Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7964"></td>
        <td id="LC7964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7965"></td>
        <td id="LC7965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;He said UNDER the cross. Well, this comes nearest to being under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7966"></td>
        <td id="LC7966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cross. It can&#39;t be under the rock itself, because that sets solid on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7967"></td>
        <td id="LC7967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ground.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7968"></td>
        <td id="LC7968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7969"></td>
        <td id="LC7969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They searched everywhere once more, and then sat down discouraged.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7970"></td>
        <td id="LC7970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck could suggest nothing. By-and-by Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7971"></td>
        <td id="LC7971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7972"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8063"></td>
        <td id="LC8063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys wanted to know what the hurry was about.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8064"></td>
        <td id="LC8064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8065"></td>
        <td id="LC8065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Never mind; you&#39;ll see, when we get to the Widow Douglas&#39;.&quot;</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC8067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck said with some apprehension--for he was long used to being</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L8126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8126"></td>
        <td id="LC8126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mary got your Sunday clothes ready, and everybody&#39;s been fretting about</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8132"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8133"></td>

        <td id="L8134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8134"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8137"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, old Mr. Jones is going to try to spring something on the people</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8140"></td>
        <td id="LC8140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here to-night, but I overheard him tell auntie to-day about it, as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8141"></td>
        <td id="LC8141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secret, but I reckon it&#39;s not much of a secret now. Everybody knows--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8142"></td>
        <td id="LC8142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the widow, too, for all she tries to let on she don&#39;t. Mr. Jones was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8143"></td>
        <td id="LC8143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bound Huck should be here--couldn&#39;t get along with his grand secret</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8145"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8148"></td>
        <td id="LC8148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;About Huck tracking the robbers to the widow&#39;s. I reckon Mr. Jones</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8149"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8150"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8152"></td>
        <td id="LC8152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sid chuckled in a very contented and satisfied way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8153"></td>
        <td id="LC8153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8154"></td>
        <td id="LC8154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Sid, was it you that told?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8155"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8156"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8157"></td>
        <td id="LC8157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8158"></td>
        <td id="LC8158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Sid, there&#39;s only one person in this town mean enough to do that, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8159"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8226"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8227"></td>
        <td id="LC8227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE reader may rest satisfied that Tom&#39;s and Huck&#39;s windfall made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8228"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sum, all in actual cash, seemed next to incredible. It was talked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8230"></td>
        <td id="LC8230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about, gloated over, glorified, until the reason of many of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8231"></td>
        <td id="LC8231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizens tottered under the strain of the unhealthy excitement. Every</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8232"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8233"></td>
        <td id="LC8233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dissected, plank by plank, and its foundations dug up and ransacked for</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8234"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8241"></td>
        <td id="LC8241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and discovered to bear marks of conspicuous originality. The village</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8242"></td>
        <td id="LC8242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paper published biographical sketches of the boys.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8243"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8244"></td>
        <td id="LC8244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Widow Douglas put Huck&#39;s money out at six per cent., and Judge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8245"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8246"></td>
        <td id="LC8246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an income, now, that was simply prodigious--a dollar for every week-day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8247"></td>
        <td id="LC8247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the year and half of the Sundays. It was just what the minister got--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8248"></td>
        <td id="LC8248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no, it was what he was promised--he generally couldn&#39;t collect it. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8249"></td>
        <td id="LC8249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dollar and a quarter a week would board, lodge, and school a boy in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8250"></td>
        <td id="LC8250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those old simple days--and clothe him and wash him, too, for that</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8416"></td>
        <td id="LC8416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8417"></td>
        <td id="LC8417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SO endeth this chronicle. It being strictly a history of a BOY, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8418"></td>
        <td id="LC8418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must stop here; the story could not go much further without becoming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8419"></td>
        <td id="LC8419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the history of a MAN. When one writes a novel about grown people, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8420"></td>
        <td id="LC8420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knows exactly where to stop--that is, with a marriage; but when he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8421"></td>
        <td id="LC8421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writes of juveniles, he must stop where he best can.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8422"></td>
        <td id="LC8422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8423"></td>
        <td id="LC8423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most of the characters that perform in this book still live, and are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8424"></td>
        <td id="LC8424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prosperous and happy. Some day it may seem worth while to take up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8425"></td>
        <td id="LC8425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story of the younger ones again and see what sort of men and women they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8426"></td>
        <td id="LC8426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned out to be; therefore it will be wisest not to reveal any of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8427"></td>
        <td id="LC8427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of their lives at present.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
